在玩家周身召唤一个持续折磨周围敌人的瘟疫光环
受到伤害后释放蜜蜂
友方蜜蜂会释放瘟疫
你的所有攻击附着瘟疫
使你免疫瘟疫
弹幕在击中敌人后会释放瘟疫蜜蜂

Tooltip.Origin:
Purity
Summons a healer guardian which heals for a certain amount of health every few seconds
Summons a defensive guardian if you have at least 10 minion slots, which boosts your movement speed and your damage resistance
Summons an offensive guardian if you are wearing the tarragon summon set (or stronger), which boosts your summon damage and your minion slots
If you get hit, most of their effects will disappear for 5 seconds
Tooltip.Translation:
圣洁
召唤治疗守卫，每几秒治疗一定的生命值
当你拥有至少10个召唤栏时，召唤防御守卫，增加你的移速和伤害减免
当你穿戴上龙蒿套或更强大的套装时，召唤进攻守卫，增加召唤伤害和召唤栏
如果你被击中，守卫的大部分效果会失效5秒

Tooltip.Origin:
Boosts rogue and ranged damage and critical strike chance by 5%
Grants a massive boost to these stats if you aren't moving
Tooltip.Translation:
增加5%盗贼和远程伤害及暴击率
站立不动时以上增幅会更强
（肉山后附魔盔甲怪）

Tooltip.Origin: You emit light and regen life more quickly at night
Tooltip.Translation: 你会散发光芒，夜晚生命恢复速度增加

Tooltip.Origin:
Whenever you crit an enemy with a rogue weapon your rogue damage increases
This effect can stack up to 150 times
Max rogue damage boost is 15%
This line is modified below
Tooltip.Translation:
盗贼武器暴击时，盗贼伤害增加
此效果可以堆叠到最多150层
增加的盗贼伤害至多为15%
当前堆叠等级：

Tooltip.Origin:
Taking damage makes you move very fast for a short time
Increases armor penetration by 20 and immune time after being struck
Provides light underwater and provides a small amount of light in the abyss
Causes stars to fall when damaged
Absorbs 25% of damage done to players on your team
Only active above 25% life
Grants immunity to knockback and reduces the cooldown of healing potions
Puts a shell around the owner when below 50% life that reduces damage
The shell becomes more powerful when below 15% life and reduces damage even further
Provides heat and cold protection in Death Mode
Tooltip.Translation:
受到伤害会短时间内极大增幅你的移速
增加20点护甲穿透,被击中后增加无敌帧
在水下提供光照，在深渊提供少许光照
受到伤害令流星从天而降
为同队的玩家吸收25%伤害
只有生命值大于25%时才会奏效
免疫击退并减少血药冷却
生命值低于50%时生成护盾减少伤害
生命值低于15%时护盾减少更多的伤害
在死亡模式下免疫高温和寒冷

Tooltip.Origin: Tells you how high your ranged proficiency is
Tooltip.Translation: 测出你的远程熟练度

Tooltip.Origin:
Increases armor penetration by 100
Increases all damage by 25%
Cuts your defense and damage reduction in half
Tooltip.Translation:
增加100点护甲穿透
增加25%所有伤害
令你的防御和减伤效果减半

Tooltip.Origin: Reduces max HP by 50% but greatly improves life regeneration
Tooltip.Translation: 减少50%最大生命值，但是会极大幅度地增加生命恢复

Tooltip.Origin: 15% increased rogue damage
Tooltip.Translation: 增加15%盗贼伤害

Tooltip.Origin: Tells you how high your rogue proficiency is
Tooltip.Translation: 测出你的盗贼熟练度

Tooltip.Origin:
One of the ancient relics
Increases max life by 20, life regen by 1, and all damage by 3%
Summons a brimstone elemental to fight for you
Tooltip.Translation:
远古遗物之一
增加20血量，1生命恢复速度以及3%伤害
召唤硫磺火元素为你而战
（硫磺火元素）

Tooltip.Origin:
10% increased damage when below 75% life
5% decreased movement speed when below 50% life
Shade rains down when you are hit
Tooltip.Translation:
生命值低于75%时增加10%伤害
生命值低于50%时减少5%移动速度
受到伤害时降落暗影雨
（腐巢意志）

Tooltip.Origin:
Stealth strikes only expend 50% of your max stealth
6% increased rogue damage, and 6% increased rogue crit chance
Tooltip.Translation:
潜伏攻击只消耗50%的最大潜行值
增加6%盗贼伤害和暴击率

Tooltip.Origin:
20% increased melee damage and speed
Reduces max life by 25%

提升20%近战伤害和近战攻速
减少25%最大生命值

Tooltip.Origin:
+1 defense and 5% increased movement speed
TOOLTIP LINE HERE
This effect has a 30 second cooldown before it can be used again
Tooltip.Translation:
增加1点防御和5%移动速度
TOOLTIP LINE HERE
这个效果有30秒的冷却时间

Tooltip.Origin:
Increased defense and damage reduction when submerged in liquid
Increased movement speed when submerged in liquid
Tooltip.Translation: 浸没在液体中时额外增加防御，伤害减免和移速

Tooltip.Origin:
Increased defense by 5 when submerged in liquid
Increases movement speed and life regen while wearing the Victide armor
Tooltip.Translation:
当你浸没在液体中时会增加5点防御
穿着胜潮套时增加移动速度和生命恢复

Tooltip.Origin:
10% increased magic damage and 10% decreased mana usage
Increases pickup range for mana stars and you restore mana when damaged
+100 max mana and reveals treasure locations if visibility is on
Tooltip.Translation:
增加10%魔法伤害，减少10%魔力消耗
提高拾取魔力星的范围，受到伤害时恢复魔力
增加100最大魔力值
打开饰品可见性，可以透视宝藏
（汉化组的温馨提示：饰品可见性开关是饰品栏小框框右上角的小眼睛）

Tooltip.Origin:
+20 maximum stealth
Stealth generates 15% faster
Tooltip.Translation:
+20最大潜行值
提高15%潜行值恢复速度

Tooltip.Origin:
Transforms the holder into a siren
Siren scales give increased defense (gives more defense in hardmode and post-ML)
Siren sight reveals enemy locations (blue-only)
Increases life regen (gives more life regen in hardmode and post-ML)
Going underwater gives you a buff
Greatly reduces breath loss and provides a small amount of light in the abyss
Enemies become frozen when they touch you
You have a layer of ice around you that absorbs 15% damage but breaks after one hit
After 30 seconds the ice shield will regenerate
Your alluring figure allows you to buy items at a reduced price from town npcs (only works in hardmode)
Wow, you can swim now!
Most of these effects are only active after Skeletron has been defeated
Revengeance drop
Tooltip.Translation:
把装备者变成小塞壬
塞壬之力令你的防御提升 (在肉山后和月后加成会提高)
塞壬之视界让你能看清所有敌人 (仅蓝色塞壬之心)
提高生命恢复 (在肉山后和月后加成会提高)
在水下活动时给予玩家一个进一步提高水下移动速度的增益
极大程度地缓解深渊造成的呼吸困难，并在深渊提供少许光照
敌人碰到你时会被冻结
获得一个环绕你的寒冰屏障，能减少15%的伤害一次，然后破碎
30秒后寒冰屏障会重生
你那妖娆的身材可以让你从NPC那儿以低廉的价格买到商品 (仅在肉山后生效)
Wow！你可以游泳了！
大多数效果需要在骷髅王后才能解锁
复仇模式专属

Tooltip.Origin:
The inside of the cloak is full of teeth...
TOOLTIP LINE HERE
Teleportation is disabled while Chaos State is active
If you dodge something while invulnerable, you instantly gain full stealth
Revengeance drop
Tooltip.Translation:
披风里面布满了尖牙利齿...
TOOLTIP LINE HERE
混乱减益持续时间内无法再次传送
如果在无敌时间内被击中，你的潜行值会立即恢复满

Tooltip.Origin:
Whenever your minions hit an enemy you will gain a random buff
These buffs will either boost your defense, summon damage, or life regen for a while
Tooltip.Translation:
你的召唤物击中敌人时会给你一个随机灵魂增幅
这些增幅包括短时增幅防御、召唤伤害和生命恢复速度

Tooltip.Origin:
50% increased mining speed and you emit light
10% increased damage reduction and increased life regen
Poison, Freeze, Chill, Frostburn, and Venom immunity
Honey-like life regen with no speed penalty, +20 max life and mana
Most bee/hornet enemies and projectiles do 75% damage to you
120% increased jump speed and 12% increased movement speed
Standing still boosts life and mana regen
Increased defense and damage reduction when submerged in liquid
Increased movement speed when submerged in liquid
Enemies take damage when they hit you
Taking a hit will make you move very fast for a short time
You emit a mushroom spore and spark explosion when you are hit
Enemy attacks will have part of their damage absorbed and used to heal you
Provides cold protection in Death Mode
Tooltip.Translation:
增加50%挖矿速度，你会散发光芒
增加10%伤害减免，增加生命恢复速度
免疫毒，冰冻，颤抖，霜火和剧毒减益
生命恢复速度就像泡在蜂蜜里一样，即使处于移动中
+20最大生命值和魔力值
绝大多数蜜蜂/马蜂对你造成的伤害减少25%
+12%移速，+120%跳跃速度
站立不动时会增加生命及魔力恢复速度
浸没在液体中时增加防御，伤害减免和移动速度
敌人击中你时会受到伤害
受到伤害会让你短时间大幅增加移速并释放爆炸孢子
你会吸收敌人的一部分伤害并治疗自己
在死亡模式下免疫高温和寒冷

Tooltip.Origin:
Increases jump speed and allows constant jumping
Can climb walls, dash, and dodge attacks
Dashes leave homing scythes in your wake
Toggle visibility of this accessory to enable/disable the dash
Tooltip.Translation:
让你能连续跳跃并增加跳跃速度
可以攀爬、冲刺和闪避伤害
冲刺时在轨迹上留下追踪镰刀
开关饰品可见性可以开启/关闭冲刺功能
（汉化组的温馨提示：饰品可见性开关是饰品栏小框框右上角的小眼睛）

Tooltip.Origin:
Increased max minions by 2 and 10% increased minion damage
Increased minion knockback
Minions cause enemies to cry on hit
Tooltip.Translation:
+2召唤栏，增加10%召唤伤害
增加召唤物击退
召唤物会打哭敌人

Tooltip.Origin:
Increased max minions by 3 and 10% increased minion damage
Increased minion knockback
Grants shadowflame powers to all minions
Minions make enemies cry on hit
Tooltip.Translation:
+3召唤栏，增加10%召唤伤害
增加召唤物击退

Tooltip.Origin: Displays almost all player stats
Tooltip.Translation: 显示你绝大部分属性的具体数据

Tooltip.Origin:

Tooltip.Origin: Tells you how high your summon proficiency is

Tooltip.Origin:

Sonar potion effect

Tooltip.Origin:
12% increased movement speed
120% increased jump speed
+20 max life and mana
Standing still boosts life and mana regen
Increased defense and damage reduction when submerged in liquid
Increased movement speed when submerged in liquid
Enemies take damage when they hit you
Taking a hit will make you move very fast for a short time
You emit a mushroom spore and spark explosion when you are hit
5% increased damage reduction
Enemy attacks will have part of their damage absorbed and used to heal you
Tooltip.Translation:
+12%移速，+120%跳跃速度，+20最大生命值和魔力值
站立不动时会增加生命及魔力恢复速度

Tooltip.Origin:
15% increased damage
Shade rains down when you are hit
You will confuse nearby enemies when you are struck
Drops brimstone fireballs from the sky occasionally
Brimstone fire rains down while invincibility is active
Temporary immunity to lava, greatly reduces lava burn damage, and 15% increased damage while in lava
Summons a fungal clump to fight for you
You leave behind poisonous seawater as you move
75% increased movement speed, 10% increase to all damage, and plus 40 defense while submerged in liquid
If you are damaged while submerged in liquid you will gain a damaging aura for a short time

Tooltip.Translation:
增加15%伤害
被击中后天降阴影之雨
受到攻击会使你周围的敌人混乱
时不时会有硫磺火球从天而降

暂时免疫岩浆伤害，大幅削弱岩浆伤害，站在岩浆里时增加15%的伤害
召唤一块真菌球为你而战

在死亡模式下免疫高温

Tooltip.Origin:
Causes stars to fall and releases bees when injured
When at full HP, your damage is increased based on your damage reduction
Damage taken at full HP is halved
This has a 10 second cooldown
Tooltip.Translation:
受伤时天降流星和释放蜜蜂
满生命值时，增加与你的伤害减免相同数值的伤害
满生命值时受到的伤害减半
减半伤害功能有10秒冷却时间

Tooltip.Origin:
You deal no damage unless stationary
Standing still grants buff(s) dependent on what weapon you're holding
Standing still provides a damaging aura around you
While moving, you regenerate health as if standing still
Provides a small amount of light in the Abyss
Provides cold protection in Death Mode
In rest may we find victory.
Tooltip.Translation:
[c/FF2400:重要！你在移动时不会造成任何伤害！]
站立不动时，会根据手持武器给予增益
站立不动时在你周围生成伤害光环
当你移动时，你会像静止一样恢复生命
在深渊提供微量光照
在死亡模式下免疫寒冷
只有休息好才能取得战斗的胜利

Tooltip.Origin:
The heart of (most of) the Terraria community
Legendary Accessory
Starts off with weak buffs to all of your stats
The stat buffs become more powerful as you progress
Reduces the DoT effects of harmful debuffs inflicted on you
Boosts your maximum flight time by 15%
Thank you to all of my supporters that made this mod a reality
Revengeance drop
Tooltip.Translation:
广大泰拉玩家的精神结晶
传奇饰品
在最早时期你会获得所有属性的微量增幅
随着游戏进程增幅更加强力
减少你身上伤害性减益的持续时间
你的飞行时间增加15%
感谢众多支持者的努力，让这一mod成为现实
也感谢汉化组的各位的努力，让灾厄mod汉化成为可能
复仇模式专属

Tooltip.Origin:
You have a 50% chance to reflect projectiles when they hit you back at the enemy for 1000% their original damage
If this effect triggers you get a health regeneration boost for a short time
If the same enemy projectile type hits you again you will resist its damage by 15%
Tooltip.Translation:
你有50%的几率反弹弹幕，反弹的弹幕会造成原始伤害的1000%
反弹成功后，你会获得短时间的生命恢复提升
再次被相同的弹幕击中，会减少15%伤害

Tooltip.Origin:
It is said that in the past, Prometheus descended from the heavens to grant man fire.
If that were true, then it is surely the demons of hell that would have risen from below to do the same.
Minions inflict shadowflame on enemy hits.
Tooltip.Translation:
在古老的传说中，普罗米修斯从天界下凡是为了给人类带来火种
如果那传说是真的，那地狱的恶魔肯定也会做同样的事儿
召唤物攻击会造成暗影炎减益

Tooltip.Origin:
Taking damage releases a blast of sparks
Sparks do extra damage in Hardmode
Immunity to Electrified and you resist all electrical projectile and enemy damage
Enemy bullets do half damage to you and are reflected back at the enemy for 800% their original damage
Tooltip.Translation:
受到伤害会释放大量电火花
电火花的伤害在肉山后会增强
免疫电击减益并减少带电弹幕的伤害
敌人的子弹只会对你造成一半的伤害，并且会反弹子弹，造成原始伤害的800%

Tooltip.Origin:
Those scurvy dogs don’t know the first thing about making bank
Summons a coin that revolves around you and steals money from enemies
Tooltip.Translation:
这些傻狗并不清楚，开一个银行要做的第一件事是什么
召唤一个围绕着你转圈，可以从敌人身上偷钱的硬币

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a damaging plague aura around the player to destroy nearby enemies

Tooltip.Origin:
After 2 seconds of standing still and not attacking you gain a buff
This buff boosts your damage by 50% and decreases damage taken by 15%
The buff deactivates after you move or attack once
Tooltip.Translation:
保持2秒站立不动并不攻击会获得一个增益
这个增益增加你50%的伤害和15%伤害减免

Tooltip.Origin: Three sparks are released on critical hits
Tooltip.Translation: 暴击会产生电火花

Tooltip.Origin:
Rogue projectiles give lifesteal on crits
12% increased rogue damage
Tooltip.Translation:
盗贼暴击会吸血

Tooltip.Origin:
Don't let the demons steal your nose

Tooltip.Translation:
不要让恶魔抢走你的鼻子！
将装备者变成雪人

Tooltip.Origin:
10% increased rogue damage
Using a rogue weapon summons a copy of the projectile that falls from the sky
Stealth strikes cause a circular fan of seeking cosmilite knives to be thrown
You'll never be alone, no matter where you go
Tooltip.Translation:
提高10%盗贼伤害
使用盗贼武器发射弹幕时，会召唤一个弹幕复制品从天而降

Makes the abyss more treachorous to navigate.

Increases damage done by several debuffs.

Effect will only work if Revengeance Mode is active.

Tooltip.Origin:
Activates Revengeance Mode, can only be used in expert mode.
Activates rage. When rage is maxed press V to activate rage mode.
You gain rage whenever you take damage or hit an enemy with a true melee weapon.
Activates adrenaline. When adrenaline is maxed press B to activate adrenaline mode.
You gain adrenaline whenever a boss is alive. Getting hit drops adrenaline back to 0.
All enemies drop 50% more cash.
All enemies gain a new damage reduction stat, which can be reduced by applying various debuffs to them.
The amount of this damage reduction stat varies based on enemy type.
Makes certain enemies immune to life steal and nerfs the effectiveness of life steal.
Increases enemy damage by 25% and spawn rates by 15%.
Nerfs the effectiveness of the Titanium Armor set bonus.
Makes life regen scale with your current HP, the higher your HP the lower your life regen (this is not based on max HP).
Reduces maximum asphalt run speed by 33%.
Increases Nurse healing price.
Allows certain enemies to inflict the Horror and Marked debuffs.
Before you have killed your first boss you take 20% less damage from everything.
Changes ALL boss AIs and some enemy AIs in vanilla and the Calamity Mod.
DO NOT USE IF A BOSS IS ALIVE!
Can be toggled on and off.
Tooltip.Translation:
开启复仇模式，此效果只能在专家模式中开启
激活左侧愤怒槽。当愤怒槽满时，按V键进入怒气状态
受到伤害或使用近战武器剑刃攻击敌人时可积攒愤怒槽
激活右侧肾上腺素槽。当肾上腺素槽满时，按B键进入兴奋状态
Boss存活时可积攒肾上腺素槽，受到伤害即会归零
如果肾上腺素槽满而不用超过3秒，兴奋状态的伤害加成会逐渐降低
敌人金钱掉落x1.5，刷怪率上升
在击杀第一个Boss之前，你获得额外20%伤害减免率
将击杀肉山前的防御计算由专家模式的每有一点防御受到0.75点伤害的换算机制改为普通模式的每有一点防御受到0.5伤害的换算机制
改变原版和灾厄所有Boss的行为规律
不要在某一Boss存活时使用此物品
此模式可以开启和关闭.

Tooltip.Translation: 如果身处幻星地或硫磺海，便能提升渔力

Tooltip.Origin: {$CommonItemTooltip.RightClickToOpen}
Summons an astrophage to follow you around
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤一只跟随你的噬星体

Tooltip.Origin:
Releases homing sparks while traveling
Stealth strikes release homing snails that create even more sparks
Tooltip.Translation:
飞行过程中释放追踪火星
潜伏攻击释放追踪蜗牛，放出更多火星

Tooltip.Origin:
It carries the mark of the Northern Star
Projectile hits grant buffs to the weapon and the player
Buffs are removed on hit
Tooltip.Translation:
它带有北极星的标记
以其弹幕击中敌人给予武器和玩家增益
受到伤害时此增益消失

Tooltip.Origin: The scales gleam like crystals
Tooltip.Translation: 它的鳞闪烁着水晶的光泽

Tooltip.Origin:
+20 defense but 35% reduced movement speed
Immune to Astral Infection and Feral Bite
Increased regeneration at lower health
Tooltip.Translation:
+20防御但是减少35%移动速度
免疫幻星感染，野性撕咬
生命值低时提升生命再生速度

Tooltip.Origin:
The wonders of angiogenesis
Grants a buff that boosts life regen for 10 seconds
The life regen boost is stronger if below 75% health
Tooltip.Translation:
给予增益，提升生命再生效果10秒钟
低于75%生命值时生命再生效果更强劲
血管新生

Tooltip.Origin: {$CommonItemTooltip.RightClickToOpen}
Fire is a living being
Tooltip.Translation: 体内含有火的生物

Tooltip.Origin:
The horns lay a curse on those who touch it
Right click to extract essence
Tooltip.Translation:
它的角将诅咒触碰任何它的人
右击提取它的精华

Tooltip.Origin: This elusive fish is a prized commodity
Tooltip.Translation: 这条稀有的鱼可以卖个好价钱

Tooltip.Origin: The horns lay a curse on those who touch it
Tooltip.Translation: 它的角将诅咒触碰任何它的人

Tooltip.Origin: Its scales are scorching hot
Tooltip.Translation: 它的鳞片烫手的吓人

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires an inaccurate spread of fireballs
The brimstone sac appears to contain fuel
Revenge is a dish best served flaming hot
Tooltip.Translation:
发射一团并不精确的火球
它的硫磺火囊里似乎装有燃料
当即复仇的滋味最为甜美

Tooltip.Origin: Darkness spreads
Tooltip.Translation: 黑暗蔓延

Tooltip.Origin: Permanently increases maximum mana by 20
Tooltip.Translation: 永久提升魔力上限20点

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires three to five lines at once. Can fish in lava.
The battlefield is a scene of constant chaos.
The winner will be the one who controls that chaos, both the pole and the fish.
Tooltip.Translation:
一次性投放三至五条鱼线， 能够在岩浆中垂钓
战场永远是充满混乱的场所
胜者必须是能够控制混乱之人，垂钓也是同样的道理

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires six lines at once. Line never snaps.
The early bird catches the fish.
Tooltip.Translation:
一次性投放六根鱼线，鱼线永不断裂
早起的鸟儿有虫吃

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires two lines at once.
Just as you have tamed the jungle monster, you can now tame the fish in the sea.
Tooltip.Translation:
一次性投放两根鱼线
你已经征服了丛林的怪物，现在征服海洋中的鱼儿也不是难事

Tooltip.Origin:
Increased fishing power in space.
A silent head and beak lanced down and plucked it out by the head,
and the beak swallowed the little fish while its tail waved frantically.
Tooltip.Translation:
在太空中提升渔力
突然白鹭的长嘴向下戳去，接着那长嘴就开始吞噬起那小鱼
而鱼尾巴这时还在发狂地摆动着。
（《人鼠之间》）

Tooltip.Origin:
While held, slowly electrifies nearby enemies.
The sea is a city.
Just below are highways, boulevards, streets and roundabouts bustling with submarine traffic.
Tooltip.Translation:
手持这把钓竿时缓慢电击周围敌人
大海是座城市。
就在我脚下，在我身边，我从未察觉到的是高速公路、林阴大道、大街和绕道，海下的车辆行人熙熙攘攘。
（《少年派的奇幻漂流》）

Tooltip.Origin:
Can fish in lava.
It is the burning lava of the soul that has a furnace within--a very volcano of grief and sorrow.
Tooltip.Translation:
能够在岩浆中垂钓
灵魂内灼热的熔岩是一口熔炉——也是一口喷涌着哀愁和忧伤的活火山

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires ten lines at once. Line never snaps and can fish from lava.
The devourer was once just an Eater of Shoals.
Tooltip.Translation:
一次性投放十条鱼线。鱼线永不断裂而且可以在岩浆中垂钓。
就连神明吞噬者也曾经在这样的鱼群中掠食。

Tooltip.Origin:
Increased fishing power when in the tundra.
The ancient alloy's prismatic qualities are perfect for attracting fish.
Tooltip.Translation:
在雪地可提升渔力。
这种远古合金反射出的多彩光泽非常适合吸引鱼儿。

Tooltip.Origin: This barely works, but it's better than nothing.
Tooltip.Translation: 这玩意质量很差，但总比没有好。

Tooltip.Origin: Right click to extract essence
Tooltip.Translation: 右击提取精华

Tooltip.Origin: Right click to extract souls
Tooltip.Translation: 右击提取灵魂

Tooltip.Origin: Right click to extract souls
Tooltip.Translation: 右击提取灵魂

Tooltip.Origin: Right click to extract souls
Tooltip.Translation: 右击提取灵魂

Tooltip.Origin: Right click to extract gems
Tooltip.Translation: 右击提取宝石

Tooltip.Origin:
How can a fish be used to dig through the ground?
Some questions are best left unanswered.
Tooltip.Translation:
我怎么用一条鱼挖地？
有些问题还是不要深究的好。

Tooltip.Origin: Right click to extract herbs and seeds
Tooltip.Translation: 右击提取草药和种子

Tooltip.Origin: {$CommonItemTooltip.RightClickToOpen}
Right click to extract essence
Tooltip.Translation: 右击提取精华

Tooltip.Origin: Camouflage is one of nature's best defenses
Tooltip.Translation: 在大自然中，隐身即无敌

Tooltip.Origin: An endangered fish that is highly prized in the market
Tooltip.Translation: 一种濒危的鱼，应该会有人出高价买下它

Tooltip.Origin: Throwing these in an aquarium would be insanity
Tooltip.Translation: 把这玩意养在水族箱里？你肯定是疯了

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons a baby ghost bell light pet
Provides a moderate amount of light while underwater
Tooltip.Translation:
召唤一只小鬼铃水母宠物
在水下提供适量光照

Tooltip.Origin: The mark of a fallen angel
Tooltip.Translation: 堕落天使的标记

Tooltip.Origin:
Reach: 28.125
Launch Velocity: 18
Pull Velocity: 14
Tooltip.Translation:
距离: 28.125
发射速度: 18
牵引速度: 14

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a concentrated laser to annihilate your foes
Defeated enemies explode into prism shards
Tooltip.Translation:
发射一道激光歼灭你的敌人
被击杀的敌人爆出棱晶碎片

Tooltip.Origin: {$CommonItemTooltip.RightClickToOpen}
Zooming at 60 miles per hour
Tooltip.Translation: 以60英里的时速巡航

Tooltip.Origin: Right click to extract blood orbs
Tooltip.Translation: 右击提取血珠

Tooltip.Origin:
A horror born of pollution and insatiable hunger; based on size alone this was merely a juvenile.
These scourge creatures are the largest aquatic predators and very rarely do they frequent such shallow waters.
Place in your inventory to gain immunity to the sulphurous waters and increase the stat gains from the Well Fed buff.
However, without the Well Fed buff your stats will decrease due to your insatiable hunger.
Tooltip.Translation:
在污染与贪食之中诞生的恐怖存在。据研究，当前大小的渊海灾虫只是青年时期的。
这些灾虫生物是海洋中最大的捕食者，不过它们很少出现在浅海之中
放置在物品栏中获得对硫磺海水的免疫力，增强吃得好增益的效果
但是，由于你的无尽饥饿，没有饱食增益时你的各项属性将下降

Tooltip.Origin:
This twisted dreamscape, surrounded by unnatural pillars under a dark and hazy sky.
Natural law has been upturned. What will you make of it?
Tooltip.Translation:
扭曲的梦幻之景，遍布四周的是参天的奇异巨柱，头顶上方是阴霾笼罩的漆黑苍穹。
这里的自然规律被彻底颠覆了，你作何感想？

Tooltip.Origin:
A titanic cyborg infected by a star-borne disease expelled from the belly of an ancient god.
The destruction of this creature will not prevent the spread of the disease.
Place in your inventory to gain increased jump speed in space.
Tooltip.Translation:
被一位古神腹中排出的星体瘟疫所感染的机械巨神。
即便是击杀它也无法阻挡瘟疫的传播
放置在物品栏中提升你在太空中的跳跃速度。

Tooltip.Origin:
God of the stars and largest vessel for the Astral Infection.
Though struck down from its place among the stars its remnants have gathered strength, aiming to take its rightful place in the cosmos once more.
Place in your inventory to gain increased movement speed in space.
Tooltip.Translation:
星体之神，星体瘟疫的散播者
尽管一度从群星间被击落至仅剩残骸，现在的它已经积蓄了足够的力量重返它应得的位置——浩瀚宇宙之间。
放置在物品栏中提升你在太空中的移动速度。

Tooltip.Origin:
We long ago feared the light of the red moon.
Many went mad, others died, but a scant few became blessed with a wealth of cosmic understanding.
Tooltip.Translation:
很久以前，我们都曾害怕过血月的光芒。
很多人疯了，有些人死了，只有幸存者中的凤毛麟角才得以一窥宇宙运行之法。

Tooltip.Origin:
An eye and now a brain.
Most likely another abomination spawned from this inchoate mass of flesh.
Allows you to teleport similar to the Rod of Discord while in the crimson. Place in your hotbar to use it.
Teleportation is disabled while Chaos State is active.
However, you become confused for a few seconds after you use it due to your overwhelming brain power.
Tooltip.Translation:
曾经的眼，如今的脑。
看起来，另一个怪物很大可能也是自这大块不完整的血肉中诞生的。
允许你在猩红之地中传送，如同使用混沌传送杖一样
混乱减益持续时间内无法传送
然而，由于你的脑力透支，传送后会受到几秒困惑减益。

Tooltip.Origin:
Ah...this place.
The scent of broken promises, pain, and eventual death is heavy in the air...
Tooltip.Translation:
啊...这个地方。
处处弥漫着痛苦，破灭的承诺和终会死亡的气息...

Tooltip.Origin:
The most powerful of the elementals, bent on exacting revenge upon the bloody inferno that demolished her home.
Finally put to rest, she will suffer no longer from the grief caused by the deaths of her people.
Place in your inventory to improve the inferno potion effect.
Tooltip.Translation:
所有元素态生命中最强大的存在，一直以来迷失于向毁灭她家乡的猩红狱火复仇的扭曲心智之中
死寂下来的她，终于不再会忍受她的追随者死绝的痛苦之中了。
放置于物品栏中，可增强狱火药水的效力。

Tooltip.Origin:
A failure of twisted scientific ambition; it appears our faulted arrogance over life has shown once more in the results.
Originally intended to be a clone of the Jungle Dragon, these were left to roam about the jungle, attacking anything in their path.
Tooltip.Translation:
野心勃勃科学计划的失败产物;傲慢地认为完全洞悉生命的奥秘或许总是会迎来相似的结果
原计划作为丛林龙的克隆体，如今只是一群在丛林中游荡，无差别攻击一切目标的疯狂生物

Tooltip.Origin:
The witch unrivaled. Perhaps the only one amongst my cohorts to have ever given me cause for doubt.
Now that you have defeated her your destiny is clear.
Come now, face me.
Place in your inventory to die instantly from every hit.
Tooltip.Translation:
那位无可匹敌的女巫。或许她是我所有部下中我唯一怀疑过的一个。
你的命运已经注定。
面对我。
放置于物品栏时，受到的所有攻击都会将你秒杀。

Tooltip.Origin:
You are indeed stronger than I thought.
Though the bloody inferno still lingers, observing your progress.
Place in your inventory to gain a boost to your minion slots but at the cost of reduced max health.
Tooltip.Translation:
你确实比我想象的要强不少。
不过猩红狱火仍然在注视着你，监视着你的发展。
放置在物品栏中，以牺牲一部分最大生命值为代价，增加召唤栏。

Tooltip.Origin:
The rotten and forever-deteriorating landscape of infected life, brought upon by a deadly microbe long ago.
It is rumored that the microbe was created through experimentation by a long-dead race, predating the Terrarians.
Place in your inventory to prevent hive cysts from spawning.
Tooltip.Translation:
呕，这片腐烂破败，持续恶化的腐化生物们的家园，是很久前由一种致命的微生物带来的。
传闻这种微生物由一个早已灭亡的种族以一次实验创造，用以猎杀泰拉大地上的生灵。
放置在物品栏中，腐化囊将不会自然生成。

Tooltip.Origin:
A crab and its mushrooms, a love story.
It's interesting how creatures can adapt given certain circumstances.
Place in your inventory to gain the Mushy buff while underground or in the mushroom biome.
However, your movement speed will be decreased while in these areas due to you being covered in fungi.
Tooltip.Translation:
螃蟹和蘑菇，一个有爱的故事。
这些生物，能适应各种特殊环境，真有趣。
放置在物品栏中，身处地下或蘑菇地形时给予与菇共生增益。
然而，你的身上被真菌覆盖，移动速度降低。

Tooltip.Origin:
This bloody hell, spawned from a formless mass of flesh that fell from the stars eons ago.
It is now home to many hideous creatures, spawned from the pumping blood and lurching organs deep within.
Place in your inventory to prevent perforator cysts from spawning.
Tooltip.Translation:
形成这个猩红地狱的，是无数团数世纪前自星空落下的，无形无相的血肉。
这地方现如今是一群自地底深处跳动的血泵和奇形怪状的器官中诞生出的丑陋而可怕的怪物家园。
放置在物品栏中，血肉囊将不会自然生成。

Tooltip.Origin:
The archmage's prison.
I am unsure if it has grown weaker over the decades of imprisonment.
Place in your inventory to gain a frost dash that freezes enemies, at the cost of slightly reduced defense due to your brittle body.
Tooltip.Translation:
羁押大法师的囚笼。
我不清楚在数十年的禁锢后，它是否失去了部分力量。
放置在物品栏中获得寒霜冲刺的能力，可以冻结敌人。代价是你的身体变得易碎，轻微降低防御力。

Tooltip.Origin:
The great sea worm appears to have survived the extreme heat and has even adapted to it.
What used to be a majestic beast swimming through the water has now become a dried-up and
gluttonous husk, constantly on a voracious search for its next meal.
Place in your inventory for an increase to defense while in the desert or sunken sea.
However, you will deal decreased damage while in these areas due to being a husk of your former self.
Tooltip.Translation:
庞大的海虫似乎从极度的炎热之中存活下来了，甚至完全适应了此处。
曾于水中畅游的巨兽现如今变成了贪食的一具空壳，
不断地寻找着下一顿美餐。
放置在物品栏中以提升身处沙漠或沉沦之海时的防御
然而，在这些地方你的攻击会降低，因为和真正的自己相比你已经变成了一具空壳。

Tooltip.Origin:
A machine brought to life by the mighty souls of warriors, and built to excavate massive tunnels in planets to gather resources.
Could have proven useful if Draedon didn't have an obsession with turning everything into a tool of destruction.
Place in your inventory to gain a boost to your pick speed.
However, your max acceleration is decreased slightly due to you feeling heavier.
Tooltip.Translation:
用强大的战士灵魂激活的机械虫子，用于在各个星球之中挖掘隧道以收集矿产资源
如果嘉登不那么执著于把所有东西都变成毁灭机器的话，它本来可以派上大用场。
放置在物品栏中以增加你的挖掘速度。
然而，你的加速度会降低，因为你感到身体变得沉重了。

Tooltip.Origin:
This serpent’s power to assimilate the abilities and energy of those it consumed is unique in almost all the known cosmos, save for its lesser brethren.
I would have soon had to eliminate it as a threat had it been given more time and creatures to feast upon.
Place in your inventory to boost the power of your true melee strikes by 50%.
However, due to your reckless nature you will take increased damage.
Tooltip.Translation:
这条巨蛇和他的小弟们吸收所吞下物体的能量甚至能力，此特性在全宇宙内恐怕绝无仅有。
倘若他有更多时间去吞噬生物获得力量，我恐怕就不得不把他当作威胁解决掉了。
放置在物品栏中增加50%近战武器剑刃的伤害。
然而，由于你莽撞的天性，你将受到额外伤害

Tooltip.Origin:
The mutant terror of the sea was once the trusted companion of an old king; he tamed it using its favorite treat.
Long ago, the creature flew in desperation from the raging bloody inferno consuming its home, ultimately finding its way to the ocean.
Place in your inventory for an increase to all damage, crit and movement speed while submerged in liquid.
However, while not submerged in liquid you will have slightly decreased damage, crit and movement speed due to feeling dried out.
Tooltip.Translation:
这个来自大海的象征着恐惧的畸变生物，曾是过去某位王者用美食驯服的可靠伙伴
很久以前，这只生物绝望的飞离了他曾经的家乡，那片被硫磺火肆虐蒸腾的海，最终安居在了它的新家
放置在物品栏中，当浸泡在液体中时提升所有伤害，暴击率和移动速度。
然而，由于感到失水，你不处于液体环境中时降低伤害，暴击率和移动速度。

Tooltip.Origin:
Perhaps it was just a giant worm infected by the microbe, given centuries to feed and grow its festering body.
Seems likely, given the origins of this place.
Deadly microbes spawn around you while this is placed in your inventory.
However, you will have decreased life regen due to your skin rotting off.
Tooltip.Translation:
也许就是被那种微生物感染的虫子，在长达数世纪的吞食和成长中获得了这副腐败的身躯
考虑到此地的起源，这很有可能。
放置在物品栏中，致命的微生物在你周围产生。
然而，由于你的皮肤开始腐烂，生命恢复速度降低。

Tooltip.Origin:
That eye...how peculiar.
I sensed it watching you more intensely as you grew stronger.
Place in your inventory for night vision at night.
However, your vision is reduced during the day.
Tooltip.Translation:
这眼睛，多么古怪。
我感觉你越强大，它就越会警觉地观察你。
放置在物品栏中增加夜视能力。
然而，你在日间视物的能力会下降。

Tooltip.Origin:
A primitive construct.
I admire the lihzahrd race for their ingenuity, though finding faith in such a flawed idol would invariably lead to their downfall.
Place in your inventory to gain increased defense while standing still.
Tooltip.Translation:
原始的造物。
我欣赏蜥蜴族的足智多谋，然而对如此粗劣的魔像产生信仰注定了他们的覆灭。
放置在物品栏中，不动时增加防御力。

Tooltip.Origin:
A hive of clustered microbial-infected flesh.
I do not believe killing it will lessen the corruption here.
Place in your inventory for all of your projectiles to inflict cursed flames when in the corruption.
However, enemy spawn rates will be greatly reduced while in the corruption due to your overwhelmingly-putrid odor.
Tooltip.Translation:
被细菌腐化的生物们的巢穴
遗憾的是，我不认为杀掉它就会停止腐化的散播。
放置在物品栏中，你在腐化之地发射的弹幕带有咒火效果。
然而，由于你周身散发的极度腐臭，在腐化之地时刷怪速率极大幅度下降。

Tooltip.Origin:
Only a fool could be caught by this pitiful excuse for a hunter.
Unfortunately, our world has no shortage of those.
Place in your inventory to gain a slight movement speed and jump boost.
However, your defense is slightly reduced due to your gelatinous body.
Tooltip.Translation:
只有傻子才会被这种贫弱的生物击败。
不幸的是，我们的世界不缺这种人。
放置在物品栏中轻微增加移动和跳跃速度。
然而，由于你胶冻般的身体，防御略微下降。

Tooltip.Origin:
An odd pair of creatures; one seeking companionship and the other seeking sustenance.
Perhaps two genetic misfits outcast from their homes that found comfort in assisting one another.
Place in your inventory to gain increased max health while wearing the siren heart and treasure detect while wearing the strange orb.
Allows the young siren pet to move normally while outside of liquids.
However, if you're not submerged in liquid you will have decreased defense and damage reduction.
Tooltip.Translation:
一对诡异的生物。一个在寻找伙伴，另一个在寻找食物。
或许两个基因怪异的生物被家乡抛弃，并在相互扶持后才安稳了下来。
放置在物品栏中，以增加装备塞壬之心时提升最大生命值以及装备奇光珠时财宝勘探的效力。
让塞壬宠物能够在液体环境外正常移动。
然而，若你没有被液体浸泡，防御力和伤害减免将下降。

Tooltip.Origin:
The gifted one that terminated my grand summoning so long ago with his uncanny powers over the arcane.
Someone I once held in such contempt for his actions is now...deceased, his sealing ritual undone...prepare for the end.
Your impending doom approaches...
Place in your inventory for an increase to all stats during the lunar event.
However, your vision is decreased due to eldritch knowledge damaging your mind.
Tooltip.Translation:
他是个天才，很久以前用他的怪异奥术终结了我的召唤。
上一个让我如此鄙视其行为的人已经...死了, 他的封印仪式还未完成...做好迎来终结的准备吧。
你的末日正在逼近...
放置在物品栏中，提升在四柱事件时的全部属性。
然而，禁忌的知识侵蚀着你的精神，视力会受到阻碍。

Tooltip.Origin:
I see you have awakened Draedon's old toys.
Once useful tools turned into savage beasts when their AIs went rogue, a mistake that Draedon failed to rectify in time.
Tooltip.Translation:
我看你已唤醒了嘉登的一些小玩具
这些曾经大有用处的工具，在嘉登的一次错误调试后程序错乱并暴走了。

Tooltip.Origin:
What a waste.
Had it been fully restored it would have been a force to behold, but what you fought was an empty shell.
However, that doesn't diminish the immense potential locked within it, released upon its death.
Place in your inventory to gain an improved Gravity Globe that gives you an increase to all stats while upside down.
However, while not upside down you have permanent featherfall.
Tooltip.Translation:
真是浪费。
他若是完全恢复了，本可作为我麾下大将。可惜，你击败的只是一具空壳。
但这丝毫未损藏于他体内的无穷潜力——在他死后改变世界的这股力量。
放置在物品栏中，在使用重力球颠倒重力时给予全属性增幅。
然而，重力未颠倒时你永久性受到羽落效果影响。

Tooltip.Origin:
Take care to not disturb the deep waters of this world.
You may awaken something more terrifying than death itself.
Place in your inventory to prevent the mysterious siren lure from spawning.
Tooltip.Translation:
小心，莫要惊扰深渊。
你或许会唤醒比死亡更可怕的东西。
放置在物品栏中，海洋中的神秘生物将不再自然生成。

Tooltip.Origin:
An abomination of comingled flesh, bone, and organ, infested primarily by blood-slurping worms.
Place in your inventory for all of your projectiles to inflict ichor when in the crimson.
However, enemy spawn rates will be greatly increased while in the crimson due to your body excreting a sweet-smelling pus.
Tooltip.Translation:
一只混合了血肉，骨头和器官的混合体，最初被吸血的虫子所寄生。
那个大脑所分离的肉块或许已经被这猩红的大地所吸收并重组成了这个东西。
放置在物品栏中，你在猩红之地发射的弹幕带有灵液。
然而，受到你身体流出的甜美脓液吸引，猩红之地刷怪速率极大幅度提升。

Tooltip.Origin:
A horrific amalgam of steel, flesh, and infection, capable of destroying an entire civilization in just one onslaught.
Its plague nuke barrage can leave an entire area uninhabitable for months. A shame that it came to this but the plague must be contained.
Place in your inventory to gain increased wing flight time, but at the cost of reduced life regen.
Tooltip.Translation:
合金，血肉和瘟疫的完美组合体，能在一场袭击中摧毁整个文明。
她携带的瘟疫核弹井可以让一片地区数月之间千里无烟寸草不生。其散播的瘟疫甚至已经到了连我们都得设法控制的程度。
放置在物品栏中，以牺牲生命恢复速度为代价增加翅膀飞翔时间。

Tooltip.Origin:
Well done, you killed a plant.
It was used as a vessel to house the spirits of those unfortunate enough to find their way down here.
I wish you luck in dealing with the fallout.
Place in your inventory to gain increased item grab range.
Tooltip.Translation:
恭喜你，你干掉了一朵花儿。
不过，这花儿是一座囚笼，用于给那些到她的厄运亡灵提供一个住所。
我希望你能够幸运的挺过你胡作非为的恶果。
放置在物品栏中提升物品拾取范围。

Tooltip.Origin:
A creature born of hatred and anger, formed by countless human souls with all of their energy entirely devoted to consuming others.
It seems a waste to have had such a potent source of power ravage mindlessly through these empty halls.
Place in your inventory to gain increased item grab range.
Tooltip.Translation:
仇恨与愤怒催生的生物，数不清人类亡魂的聚合体，以吞噬为唯一目的。
让如此一股强大的力量在地牢空荡的厅室中漫无目的地闲逛，这近乎是种浪费。
放置在物品栏中提升物品拾取范围。

Tooltip.Origin:
The ever-rejuvenating guardians of the profaned flame.
Much like a phoenix from the ashes their deaths are simply a part of their life cycle.
Many times my forces have had to destroy these beings in search of the Profaned Goddess.
Tooltip.Translation:
亵渎火焰那永葆活力的守护者们。
如同凤凰，死亡仅仅是它们生命循环的一部分。
为了寻找亵渎天神，我的军队曾无数次摧毁了这种存在。

Tooltip.Origin:
A core surrounded by stone and flame, a simple origin and a simple goal.
What would have become of us had she not been defeated is a frightening concept to consider.
Place in your inventory to imbue all projectiles with profaned flames, causing them to inflict extra damage.
However, your max life is decreased due to a part of your soul being required to fuel the profaned flames.
Tooltip.Translation:
石与火围绕着核心，她的目的就和她的存在形式一样简单。
若她不是我们的敌人而是盟友，我们本可以联手成就超乎想象的霸业。
放置在物品栏中使你的弹幕带有渎神之火, 造成额外伤害。
然而，你需要奉上部分灵魂维持渎神之火的燃烧，最大生命值降低。

Tooltip.Origin:
As crude as the giant insects are they can prove useful in certain situations...given the ability to control them.
Place in your inventory to make small bees and weak hornets friendly.
Tooltip.Translation:
简陋的生物，跟那些巨型昆虫一样，某些情况下她们会证明自身的作用
...在被控制的情况下。
放置在物品栏中使小号的蜜蜂和较弱的黄蜂变得友好。

Tooltip.Origin:
The flesh golem constructed using twisted necromancy during the time of my conquest to counter my unstoppable forces.
Its creators were slaughtered by it moments after its conception. It is for the best that it has been destroyed.
Place in your inventory to gain an increase to all damage, but at the cost of reduced wing flight time.
Tooltip.Translation:
由扭曲死灵法术打造，曾企图阻挡我的不败之师的血肉魔像。
它的创造者在赋予它生命之后片刻即被它碾碎，如此邪物还是被毁掉比较好。
放置在物品栏中增加所有伤害，但降低翅膀飞翔时间。

Tooltip.Origin:
Signus. The Void. The Weaver.
Each represent one of the Devourer’s largest spheres of influence.
Dispatching them has most likely invoked its anger and marked you as a target for destruction.
Tooltip.Translation:
西格纳斯，虚空，和编织者。
每一位都代表着神明吞噬者散播着影响力，
了结他们的性命，大概会引起神明吞噬者的愤怒，将你作为下一个撕碎的目标。

Tooltip.Origin:
The curse is said to only affect the elderly.
After they are afflicted they become an immortal vessel for an ancient demon of the underworld.
Place in your inventory to gain increased damage while in the dungeon.
However, your max health is decreased due to Skeletron's curse.
Tooltip.Translation:
据传，这个诅咒只对长者有效。
当他们被诅咒时，他们就成为了地狱中的一个远古恶魔夺舍的躯壳。
放置在物品栏中，增加身处地牢中造成的伤害
然而，骷髅王的诅咒使你的最大生命值降低。

Tooltip.Origin:
What a silly and pointless contraption for something created with the essence of pure terror.
Draedon obviously took several liberties with its design...I am not impressed.
Place in your inventory to gain a boost to your armor penetration.
However, your max acceleration is decreased due to you feeling heavier.
Tooltip.Translation:
用纯净的恐惧之力打造这么个愚蠢而毫无意义的机器，多么暴殄天物啊。
很明显，嘉登对他的设计做出了一些微妙的改动，这并不让我感到新奇...尽快摧毁他们吧。
放置在物品栏中增加护甲穿透。
然而，你的加速度会降低，因为你感到身体变得沉重了。

Tooltip.Origin:
It is a travesty, one of the most threatening biological terrors ever created.
If this creature were allowed to combine every slime on the planet it would become nearly unstoppable.
Place in your inventory to become slimed and able to slide around on tiles quickly, at the cost of reduced defense.
This effect makes dashing more difficult and does not work with mounts.
Tooltip.Translation:
荒谬的是，这是有史以来最令人恐惧，最具威胁性的生命。
如果这个生物能够融合星球之上所有所有史莱姆的话，它将不可阻挡
放置在物品栏中使自己被粘液浸润，能在物块上滑行，代价是减少防御力
此效果使冲刺更加困难，在坐骑上不起效。

Tooltip.Origin:
I remember the serene waves and the clear breeze.
The bitterness of my youth has long since subsided, but it is far too late. I must never repeat a mistake like this again.
Tooltip.Translation:
我还能依稀回想起此处的清风与碧波。
时光抚平了我年轻时的苦涩创伤，但现在已经太迟太迟了。我绝不能容许这种错误再次发生。

Tooltip.Origin:
The bio-mechanical watchers of the night, originally created as security using the souls extracted from human eyes.
These creatures did not belong in this world, it's best to be rid of them.
Place in your inventory to gain invisibility and rogue bonuses at night.
However, your defense is reduced while above 50% life due to you feeling softer.
Your max acceleration is reduced while below 50% life due to you feeling heavier.
Tooltip.Translation:
夜晚的生化机械看守者，由从人类眼中提取出的灵魂精粹创造而出。
这种生物不应当存在于这个世界，最好让它们离开。
放置在物品栏中，在夜晚隐形并获得盗贼增益。
然而，在50%生命值以上时护甲降低，因为你感到身体变软了。
生命值在50%以下时你的加速度会降低，因为你感到身体变得沉重了。

Tooltip.Origin:
These obsidian and hellstone towers were once home to thousands of...'people'.
Unfortunately for them, they were twisted by their inner demons until they were beyond saving.
Place in your inventory to prevent voodoo demons from spawning.
Tooltip.Translation:
这些黑曜石塔和狱炎塔，曾经是无数...'人'的家园。
很遗憾，他们被内心的恶魔们扭曲了，直到他们不值得被救赎。
放置在物品栏中，巫毒恶魔将不再自然生成。

Tooltip.Origin:
I see the deed is done.
The unholy amalgamation of flesh and hatred has been defeated.
Prepare to face the terrors that lurk in the light and dark parts of this world.
Place in your inventory to gain increased item grab range.
Tooltip.Translation:
你做了那件事，我看到了。
那个污浊的，由血肉和憎恨所融合而成的怪物死了。
准备迎接潜藏在这世界的光与暗之中的真正的恐惧吧。
放置在物品栏中提升物品拾取范围。

Tooltip.Origin:
I would not be able to bear a world without my faithful companion by my side.
Fortunately, fate will have it so that it is a world I shall never have to see, for better or for worse.
Place in your inventory to gain nearly-infinite wing flight time, but at the cost of a 25% decrease to all damage.
Tooltip.Translation:
我绝无可能忍受一个没有我最忠诚伙伴陪伴的世界。
幸运的是，命运的安排免去了我忍受这种境遇的痛苦——永不分离，或一同死去。
放置在物品栏中获得近乎无限的飞翔时间，但降低25%所有伤害。

Tooltip.Origin: It radiates godly energy
Tooltip.Translation: 散发出神一般的光辉

Tooltip.Origin: A chunk of highly-resistant cosmic steel
Tooltip.Translation: 一团高硬度的宇宙金属

Tooltip.Origin:
The smoke feels warm
Looks funky when placed
Tooltip.Translation:
冒出来的烟尚有余温
放在地上看着挺时髦的

Tooltip.Origin: Cold to the touch
Tooltip.Translation: 摸上去很冷

Tooltip.Origin: A shard of lunar and solar energy
Tooltip.Translation: 日与月的精华凝聚

Tooltip.Origin: The cells of abyssal creatures
Tooltip.Translation: 深渊生物的细胞

Tooltip.Origin: A chunk of crystallized holy energy
Tooltip.Translation: 蕴藏着神圣能量的晶石

Tooltip.Origin: It vibrates with fluffy golden energy
Tooltip.Translation: 流动着蓬松的金色能量

Tooltip.Origin: Great for preventing heat stroke
Tooltip.Translation: 预防中暑的绝佳材料

Tooltip.Origin: The essence of chaotic creatures
Tooltip.Translation: 混沌生命之精华

Tooltip.Origin: The essence of sky, light, and storm creatures
Tooltip.Translation: 天空，圣光及沙暴生命之精华

Tooltip.Origin: The essence of cold creatures
Tooltip.Translation: 寒冰生命之精华

Tooltip.Origin: A shard of the cosmos
Tooltip.Translation: 广阔宇宙的结晶

Tooltip.Origin: Large scale of an apex predator
Tooltip.Translation: 顶级捕食者的巨大鳞片

Tooltip.Origin: The membrane of an astral creature's wings
Tooltip.Translation: 幻星生物的翅膀膜

Tooltip.Origin: A shard of a godly soul
Tooltip.Translation: 神一样灵魂的其中一小片

Tooltip.Origin: A shard of lumenous energy
Tooltip.Translation: 蕴含着闪光能量的晶片

Tooltip.Origin: The remains of a mollusk
Tooltip.Translation: 软体动物的遗留物

Tooltip.Origin: May drain your sanity
Tooltip.Translation: 会搅乱你的心智

Tooltip.Origin: Sharp enough to cut diamonds
Tooltip.Translation: 坚硬到足以斩开钻石的程度

Tooltip.Origin: A shard of the distant past
Tooltip.Translation: 来自遥远过去的碎片

Tooltip.Origin: Sunlight cannot penetrate the fabric of this cloth
Tooltip.Translation: 没有任何一缕阳光能够穿透这块布料的纤维

Tooltip.Origin: The essence of profaned creatures
Tooltip.Translation: 亵渎生物的精华

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a brimrose mount
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤硫火玫瑰坐骑

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons an alicorn
Revengeance drop
Tooltip.Translation:
召唤一只小马坐骑“音韵公主”
复仇模式专属

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a shadow dragon
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤一条暗影巨龙

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons a drill to drill through the world so you can destroy all the neat world generation
with complete disregard for all the creatures that inhabit these lands. I am sure the EPA and PETA would like
to have a word with you afterwards.
Tooltip.Translation:
召唤一台钻机钻遍全世界，把世界搅得一团糟
丝毫不顾及栖息在这片土地上的任何生物。
环保局和善待动物组织的人事后肯定会找你喝茶。

Tooltip.Origin: JELLY BEAN
Tooltip.Translation: 果冻豆

Tooltip.Origin: Summons an angry dog mount
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤愤怒雪狗坐骑

Tooltip.Origin:
I'll be there in the blink of an eye
This line is modified below
Teleportation is disabled while Chaos State is active
Boosts movement and fall speed by 10%
Works while in the inventory
Tooltip.Translation:
眨眼即至！
按Z传送至鼠标位置
混乱减益持续时间内无法传送
增加10%移速和降落速度
在物品栏里时依然有效

Tooltip.Origin:
It has a distinctly sweet flavor and a strong aroma
Permanently increases maximum life by 25
Can only be used if the max amount of life fruit has been consumed
Tooltip.Translation:
它很甜，也很香
永久增加25点最大生命值
仅在达到最大生命值时才能使用

Tooltip.Origin: Permanently increases maximum mana by 50
Tooltip.Translation: 永久增加50点最大魔法值

Tooltip.Origin:
Though somewhat bland, what taste can be described is unlike any other experienced
Permanently increases maximum life by 25
Can only be used if the max amount of life fruit has been consumed
Tooltip.Translation:
尽管味道有些寡淡，但这味道绝对堪称是种全新的体验
永久增加25点最大生命值
仅在达到最大生命上限后方能食用

Tooltip.Origin:
Permanently makes Adrenaline Mode take 5 less seconds to charge
Revengeance drop
Tooltip.Translation:
永久让肾上腺素条的充能时间减少5秒
复仇模式专属

Tooltip.Origin:
A tangy, tart flavor with a somewhat earthen touch
Permanently increases maximum life by 25
Can only be used if the max amount of life fruit has been consumed
Tooltip.Translation:
摸上去像是土做的，尝起来酸甜香浓
永久增加25点最大生命值
仅在达到最大生命上限后方能食用

Tooltip.Origin:
Permanently makes Adrenaline Mode take 10 less seconds to charge
Revengeance drop
Tooltip.Translation:
永久让肾上腺素条的充能时间减少10秒
复仇模式专属

Tooltip.Origin: Permanently increases maximum mana by 50
Tooltip.Translation: 永久增加50点最大魔法值

Tooltip.Origin:
Permanently makes Rage Mode do 15% more damage
Revengeance drop
Tooltip.Translation:
永久在愤怒模式中增加15%伤害
复仇模式专属

Tooltip.Origin:
Refreshing and cool, perhaps even a bit minty
Permanently increases maximum life by 25
Can only be used if the max amount of life fruit has been consumed
Tooltip.Translation:
令人神清气爽，甚至好像略带薄荷的香气
永久增加25点最大生命值
仅在达到最大生命上限后方能食用

Tooltip.Origin:
Alien power pulses inside its layers
Consuming it does something that cannot be reversed
Tooltip.Translation:
外星的力量激荡在它的层叠之中
使用它会带来一些不可逆的后果

Tooltip.Origin:
Permanently makes Rage Mode do 15% more damage
Revengeance drop
Tooltip.Translation:
永久增加愤怒状态15%伤害
复仇模式专属

Tooltip.Origin: Permanently increases maximum mana by 50
Tooltip.Translation: 永久增加50点最大魔法值

Tooltip.Origin:
Permanently makes Rage Mode do 15% more damage
Revengeance drop
Tooltip.Translation:
永久增加愤怒状态15%伤害
复仇模式专属

Tooltip.Origin:
Permanently makes Adrenaline Mode take 10 less seconds to charge
Revengeance drop
Tooltip.Translation:
永久减少肾上腺素的充能时间10秒
复仇模式专属

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a pet guardian angel
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤守护天使宠物 -- 小熊

Tooltip.Origin: Summons an amalgamated pile of flesh
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤一堆聚合的血肉

Tooltip.Origin:
The ultimate reward for defeating such a beast...
Who knew she'd be so darn cute!
Tooltip.Translation:
打败这难以置信的怪物后获得的终极奖励...
但谁会知道原来她这么可爱！

Tooltip.Origin: Contains a small amount of brimstone
Tooltip.Translation: 包含一些硫磺火石

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons the devourer of the cosmos...?
Sharp objects possibly included
Suppresses friendly red devils
Tooltip.Translation:
召唤宇宙的吞食者...?
可能装有锋利物件
魔影套装的红恶魔不会出现

Tooltip.Origin: Calls Akato, son of Yharon, to your side
Tooltip.Translation: 把阿卡托--犽戎之子，呼唤到你身边

Tooltip.Origin:
'It contains 1 file on it'
'Fox.cs'
Tooltip.Translation:
'这个云盘里只有这一个文件'
'Fox.cs'

Name.Origin: Hermit's Box of One Hundred Medicines

Tooltip.Origin:
As the ice melts in the springs
And waves wash the old moss’ hair...
Thank you, Goodbye.
Summons the Third Sage
Use the item with right click in the hotbar to toggle the Third Sage's blessing.
With the blessing, the player will spawn with full health rather than half.
Tooltip.Translation:
气霁风梳新柳发
冰消波洗旧苔须
欢迎回来，搭档
召唤第三贤者
放置在快捷栏中右键使用该物品以永久获得第三贤者的祝福
第三贤者的祝福会使玩家以满生命值重生，而不是一半。.

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a baby Leviathan pet
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤利维坦宝宝

Tooltip.Origin: Did they just...
Tooltip.Translation: 它们刚刚是不是...

Tooltip.Origin:
The crystal contains traces of holothurin
Summons a radiator light pet
Provides a small amount of light in the abyss
Tooltip.Translation:
召唤发光的辐射海参宠物
这块水晶含有痕量的海参毒素
在深渊中提供少许光亮

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a never forgotten friend
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤一位从未被遗忘的伙伴

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons an electric troublemaker
A little note is attached:
Thank you, Aloe! Very much appreciated from Ben
Tooltip.Translation:
召唤电鬼洛托姆
这有张小纸条：
谢谢你，Aloe! 非常感谢 来自：Ben

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons a young Siren light pet
Provides a large amount of light while underwater
Tooltip.Translation:
召唤一个萝莉塞壬照亮四周
在深渊里提供大量光照

Tooltip.Origin: Summons the trash man
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤垃圾男！

Tooltip.Origin: It resonates with otherworldly energy.
Tooltip.Translation: 其上回响着异界之能量

Tooltip.Origin:
When placed, nearby players gain 15% movement speed, 10% wing time, and 5% acceleration
'The floating flame seems to uplift your very spirit'
Tooltip.Translation:
放置时，增加附近玩家15%移速，10%飞行时间，5%加速度
'跃动的火焰似乎使你的精神获得升华'

Tooltip.Origin: The mere presence of this candle enrages surrounding enemies drastically
Tooltip.Translation: 这个蜡烛的存在大大激怒了附近的敌人

Tooltip.Origin:
When placed down nearby players have their movement speed increased by 15% and crit chance by 10%
Nearby players also suffer a 20% decrease to their damage reduction
Tooltip.Translation:

Tooltip.Origin:
Extra spicy and bloody!

辣而血腥！

咦？酒怎么突然没了？

A great-tasting cinnamon whiskey with a touch of cream soda

Revengeance drop

无消耗

The core of the unholy flame

不洁火焰的核心

极快的牵引速度

召唤沙尘暴

Tooltip.Origin: Summons the moon

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons the rain.
Rain will start some time after this item is used.
If used while it's raining, the rain will stop some time afterward.
In Death Mode, using this item while it's raining will reduce the amount of time the rain lingers for
to one minute; however, not any lower, and this will cause the rain to turn violent for that minute.

召唤滂沱大雨
大雨会在使用后过一会儿开始降
如果在下雨时使用，一小会儿后雨会停

Tooltip.Origin: Shoots extremely powerful high velocity rounds that inflict a powerful bleed debuff

发射极高速子弹，造成一个强大的流血减益
取材自Warframe

Tooltip.Origin: 20% chance to not consume gel
Tooltip.Translation: 20%几率不消耗凝胶

Tooltip.Origin:
70% chance to not consume flares
Fires a storm of ectoplasm and flares
Tooltip.Translation:
70%几率不消耗信号弹
发射信号弹和幽灵

Tooltip.Origin: Fires a powerful homing soul

Tooltip.Origin: Fires spikes that stick to enemies, tiles, and explode into shrapnel

Tooltip.Origin: Fires a mix of normal, starfury, and astral stars

Tooltip.Origin: Fires a spread of plasma blasts
Tooltip.Translation: 发射数个等离子星弹

Tooltip.Origin: Fires a barrage of stars and plasma blasts
Tooltip.Translation: 发射星辰与等离子星弹

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a chain of comets
Fires a bigger, more powerful comet every four rounds
Look to the stars for a galaxy far, far away

发射一束陨星
每四次攻击发射一个更大的陨星
眺望遥远星系的闪烁群星

Tooltip.Origin: Launches an explosive astral crystal
Tooltip.Translation: 发射一个爆炸幻星水晶

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a spray of bullets
90% chance to not consume ammo

发射数颗子弹
90%几率不消耗子弹

Tooltip.Origin:
Fear the storm
Does not consume ammo
Tooltip.Translation:
恐惧并臣服于风暴的力量
不消耗弹药

Tooltip.Origin: Fires an acidic bubble that sticks to enemies and emits sulphuric gas
Tooltip.Translation: 发射一个硫酸泡，粘在敌人身上并释放酸

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires several barrages of bullets
Right click to zoom out
Tooltip.Translation:
发射出巨量子弹
右击以扩大视野

Tooltip.Origin: Shoots an extremely fast energy arrow
Tooltip.Translation: 发射出一支极快的能量箭

Tooltip.Origin: 80% chance to not consume gel
Tooltip.Translation: 80%几率不消耗凝胶

Tooltip.Origin: Shoots greatarrows that crush enemy armor and break into shards on death
Tooltip.Translation: 发射碎甲弩箭，消失时释放碎片

Tooltip.Origin: 70% chance to not consume gel
Tooltip.Translation: 70%几率不消耗凝胶

Tooltip.Origin: Launches a variety of rockets that explode into bees on death
Tooltip.Translation: 发生多种瘟疫火箭 爆炸时生成瘟疫蜂

Tooltip.Origin: Fires large homing rockets that explode into more homing mini rockets when in proximity to an enemy
Tooltip.Translation: 发射一个大的追踪火箭，接近敌人时爆炸出小的追踪火箭

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a spread of arrows from the sky
Wooden arrows are converted to lightning bolts
Tooltip.Translation:
风暴般的箭矢从天而降
木箭被替换为闪电

Tooltip.Origin: Fires a laser
Tooltip.Translation:
发射一束激光
不消耗硬币

Tooltip.Origin: Launches three harpoons
Tooltip.Translation: 发射三个鱼叉

Tooltip.Origin: @everyone
Tooltip.Translation: @全体成员

Tooltip.Origin: Fires bubbles everywhere that pop into bullets
Tooltip.Translation: 从各个方向发射泡泡，爆炸时产生子弹

Tooltip.Origin: Throws a disk that has a chance to generate several disks if enemies are near it
Tooltip.Translation:
掷出元素飞盘，敌怪在附近时有几率生成数个新的元素飞盘
切碎现实！

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a giant plague cell with a lethal aura that splits into 6 plague seekers in death
Stealth strikes cause the plague cell to move slower, accumulating an aura of swirling plague seekers as it flies
Tooltip.Translation:
丢出一个巨大的瘟疫细胞，对接近的敌人造成伤害，消失时释放6只瘟疫搜寻蜂
潜伏攻击会使瘟疫细胞移动更慢，飞行时释放瘟疫搜寻蜂

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a fast, small stalactite that crumbles to dust after travelling a short distance
Stealth strikes cause a larger, more damaging stalagmite to be thrown which travels slower and further before crumbling to damaging dust
Tooltip.Translation:
丢出一个小而快的石钟乳，飞行一小段距离后化为灰烬
潜伏攻击会丢出一个更大的石钟乳，造成更多伤害
飞行速度降低但会在移动更远距离后才消失，最终化为能造成伤害的飞尘

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a sticky bomb that explodes into spikes and poison clouds
Stealth strikes throw three at once
Tooltip.Translation:
丢出一个深渊炸弹，爆炸出毒刺和毒云
潜伏攻击会一次掷出三个炸弹

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a rolling barrel that explodes on wall collision
Stealth strikes makes the barrel bounce twice before disappearing with varied effects after each bounce
'Some people used to jump over these'
Tooltip.Translation:
丢出一个滚动爆炸桶，路径上碰到阻挡方块时爆炸
潜伏攻击会让桶在爆炸前反弹两次，且反弹时也会产生爆炸效果
“有些人常常会在它上面飞起来”

Tooltip.Origin:
Stacks up to 3
Stealth strikes releases all stars at once with infinite piercing
Tooltip.Translation:
最多堆叠3个
潜伏攻击会一次投出所有回旋镖，且能够无限穿透

Tooltip.Origin:
Slows down when hitting an enemy. Speeds up otherwise
Heals on enemy hits
Stealth strikes spawns homing blood on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation:
击中敌怪时减速，其余时候加速
击中敌怪时治疗玩家
潜伏攻击在击中敌怪时生成追踪血珠

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a grenade which bounces after exploding
Stealth strikes explode into a violent blast of fire and shrapnel when it bounces
Tooltip.Translation:
丢出一个手雷，会反弹且在反弹时爆炸
潜伏攻击会使爆炸更剧烈，同时发射出尖刺

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws an eyeball that bounces off of surfaces.
Knockback is much stronger during a blood moon
Stealth strikes causes the eyeballs to move much faster and bounce more energetically
Tooltip.Translation:
掷出一个弹跳眼球
在血月时击退增强
潜伏攻击会使眼球移动和反弹速度更快

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a very bouncy ball that richochets off walls and enemies
Receives a small boost in damage and velocity after bouncing off an enemy
Stealth strikes provide a bigger boost after richocheting
Tooltip.Translation:
丢出弹跳尖钉球
每弹一次，伤害和弹跳速度都会小幅增加
潜伏攻击会在反弹后获得更大的加成

Tooltip.Origin: Explodes into poisonous seawater blasts
Tooltip.Translation: 爆炸产生剧毒海水弹

Tooltip.Origin: Throws a blade that splits on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation: 投出击中敌人时分裂的硫火手里剑

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a shadowflame spiky ball that bursts into flames
Stealth Strikes make the ball linger and explode more violently
'Definitely not pocket safe'
Tooltip.Translation:
掷出暗影炎尖钉球，会爆炸出暗影焰
潜伏攻击令尖钉球爆炸更剧烈
“装在背包里并不安全”

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a fast homing scythe
The scythe will bounce after hitting an enemy up to six times
Stealth strikes creates damaging afterimages
Tooltip.Translation:
掷出追踪镰刀
击中敌人时镰刀会反弹 最多击中六个敌人
潜伏攻击会在飞行过程中留下残像造成伤害

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a scythe that splits into multiple scythes on enemy hits
Stealth strikes throw a chain of three scythes
Tooltip.Translation:
掷出一把圣金镰刀——星神之杀，击中敌怪时分裂出数把小镰刀
潜伏攻击效果为一次掷出三把镰刀

Tooltip.Origin: Stealth strikes home in after hitting an enemy
Tooltip.Translation: 潜伏攻击追踪敌人

Tooltip.Origin:
The bottle is surprisingly dusty
Throws a holy flask of water that explodes into a sacred flame pillar on death
The pillar is destroyed if there's no tiles below it
Stealth strikes create three flame pillars instead of one on impact
Tooltip.Translation:
'这个瓶子出乎意料地布满灰尘'
投掷一个神圣水瓶，爆炸后形成一个神圣火柱
如果爆炸位置的下方没有物块，火柱会消失
潜伏攻击会形成三道火柱

Tooltip.Origin: Seems like it has worn down over time
Tooltip.Translation: 它似乎随时间流逝逐渐崩解

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a stream of short-range kunai
Stealth strikes spawn 5 Cosmic Scythes which home and explode
Tooltip.Translation:
发射鬼畜的短程苦无
潜伏攻击会发射5把追踪爆炸的星体飞镰

Tooltip.Origin: Throws disks that roll on the ground, occasionally launches an explosive disk
Tooltip.Translation: 投掷在地面滚动的飞盘,偶尔会投掷爆炸飞盘

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws bouncing axes
Stealth strikes throw five at once
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷可以弹跳的硫火飞爪
潜伏攻击可以一次投掷五个

Tooltip.Origin:
Splits into several projectiles as it travels 
Stealth Strikes makes the blade split more and create crystals when destroyed
Tooltip.Translation:
飞行时分裂成几个短距离飞刀
潜伏攻击分裂出更多的飞刀，并在命中时产生碎裂水晶

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a crystal javelin that pierces infinitely
Stealth strikes travel through blocks, ignore gravity, and summon crystal shards as they fly
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷一支可以无限穿透的水晶标枪
潜伏攻击将使标枪可以穿过物块且无视重力并在飞行时召唤水晶碎块

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws bouncing daggers
Stealth strikes are showered in cursed fireballs
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷弹跳匕首
潜伏攻击会使咒焰匕首释放咒焰火球

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a dumbbell that bounces and flings weights with each bounce
Right click to flex with it, increasing the power of your next throw with a stealth strike
Can boost the projectile damage up to 7.5 times its original damage
Tooltip.Translation:
抛出一个可以反弹的哑铃，每次反弹都会分裂出小射弹
右键可以举起哑铃，增加你下次潜伏攻击的力量
可以将伤害提升至原来的7.5倍

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws an abyssal hatchet that inflicts Armor Crunch and Marked for Death to the enemies it hits
Stealth strikes cause the hatchet to be thrown faster and trail water, inflicting Crush Depth in addition to the other debuffs
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷一把深渊战斧，造成盔甲破碎和标记减益
潜伏攻击会使斧头飞的更快，并造成深渊水压减益

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a variety deadly spheres with different effects
Stacks up to 5
Stealth strikes launch all 4 sphere types at once
Tooltip.Translation:
发射带着不同效果的各种致命之球
可以堆叠至5个
潜伏攻击能一次发射出全部的四种致命之球

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a lightning bolt to electrocute enemies
The lightning bolt travels faster while it is raining
Summons lightning from the sky on impact
Stealth strikes summon more lightning and travel faster
Tooltip.Translation:
发射圣雷天劫电击周围敌人
下雨时增加弹幕飞行速度
弹幕击中敌人时从天上降下闪电
潜伏攻击召唤更多闪电且弹幕移速提高

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws an unholy flask of water that explodes into an explosion of bubbles on death
Stealth strikes spawn additional bubbles that inflict Ichor and Cursed Inferno
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷一瓶邪恶之水，破碎后形成追踪气泡
潜伏攻击形成更多气泡，并造成咒焰和灵液减益

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a hydro axe which shreds enemies when it comes into contact with them
The faster it’s spinning, the more times it hits before disappearing
Stealth Strikes make it emit short-ranged bubbles.
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一把飞斧，接触敌人后停在原地造成持续伤害
它旋转地越快，造成伤害次数越多
潜伏攻击会在飞行轨迹上留下泡泡

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a spear that bounces a lot
Stealth strikes throws three high speed spears
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷一把可以弹跳很多次的标枪
潜伏攻击扔出三把高速标枪

Tooltip.Origin: Explodes into a dust cloud
Tooltip.Translation: 炸裂成一团粉尘云

Tooltip.Origin:
When the sun goes dark, you will know judgment
Summons spears from the sky on hit
Stealth strikes impale enemies and summon a constant barrage of spears over time
Tooltip.Translation:
当日蚀之阴降临的时候，你就会得知审判的结果
击中敌人时召唤长矛从天而降
潜伏攻击会使长矛扎在敌人身上并持续召唤长矛

Tooltip.Origin: Throws a flurry of bouncing knives that can heal the user
Tooltip.Translation: 投出一簇能够弹射并治疗玩家的飞刀

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a high velocity axe that returns to you after travelling a short distance or hitting a wall
At the furthest point from the player, a magical axe that travels through walls will be cast towards the nearest enemy
Stealth strikes makes the axe fly further, throwing out many other magical axes in all directions
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一把高速飞斧，撞到物块或短距离飞行后返回
在每次飞行最远点召唤一个能穿墙和自动瞄准的魔法飞斧
潜伏攻击使斧头飞的更远，并在命中时向四面八方发射魔法飞斧

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a plagued boomerang that releases plague seekers when it hits tiles or enemies
Stealth strikes makes the boomerang release plague seekers constantly as it travels
'Contrary to its name, it will probably cause an epidemic if used incorrectly'
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一把瘟疫回旋镖，碰撞物块或敌人时释放瘟疫寻觅者
潜伏攻击导致回旋镖飞行过程不断释放瘟疫寻觅者
'与它的名字相反，如果使用不当，就会引起瘟疫爆发'

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a dark/light boomerang that confuses enemies
The boomerang will create light shards upon hitting enemies when thrown out, and will fire homing dark shards when returning
Stealth strikes cause the boomerang to create both dark and light shards whenever one type would be created
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一把能使敌人迷惑的黑暗/光明回旋镖
回旋镖在扔出去击中敌人时召唤光明碎块，在返回时召唤追踪的黑暗碎块
潜伏攻击会同时释放两种碎块

Tooltip.Origin: Throws a disk that fires lasers at nearby enemies
Tooltip.Translation: 投出一个向周围敌人发射激光的飞盘

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a stream of homing blades
Stealth strikes summon a guillotine of blades on hit
Tooltip.Translation:
发射一连串追踪飞刀
潜伏攻击召唤一排飞刀从天而降

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a hallowed cross which explodes into a flash of light that damages nearby enemies, closer enemies receiving more damage
As the cross travels downwards, the damage inflicted by both the cross and flash increases constantly
Stealth strikes cause the cross to be thrown with full damage immediately. Hallowed stars fall when the cross explodes
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一个神圣十字架，能爆炸并发出闪光，对范围敌人造成伤害
当十字架下落时，造成的伤害会变多
潜伏攻击时造成神圣流星降落

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires high velocity talismans that ignore gravity
Talismans attach to enemies, causing them to release lost souls
Stealth strikes release more souls and leave behind souls as they travel
Tooltip.Translation:
发射不受重力影响的高速符咒
符咒会黏在敌人身上，使它们不断释放追踪的失落灵魂
潜伏攻击会释放更多的灵魂并在飞行轨迹上也释放灵魂

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a knife which summons homing feathers
Stealth strike throws a volley of knives
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一把会召唤追踪羽毛的飞刀
潜伏攻击会扔出一连串的飞刀

Tooltip.Origin: Throws a scythe that explodes on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation: 扔出接触敌人会爆炸的飞镰

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a long ranged boomerang that explodes into icicles on hit
Stealth strikes throws three short ranged boomerangs along with a spread of icicles
Tooltip.Translation:
发射长距离回旋镖，接触敌人时产生碎冰
潜伏攻击扔出三把回旋镖并在沿途留下碎冰

Tooltip.Origin:
Sticks to enemies
Generates a localized hailstorm
'Do not insert in flare gun'
Tooltip.Translation:
可以扎在敌人身上
生成冰霜风暴
'不需要装填在信号枪里'

Tooltip.Origin: Explodes and summons death lasers on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation: 击中敌人爆炸并释放死亡射线

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws bouncing darts
Stealth strikes ignore gravity and bounce more vigorously
They additionally leak slime and cover enemies in dark sludge
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷弹跳飞镖
潜伏攻击将使飞镖忽视重力并更有力地反弹
它们还会额外溢出凝胶束并将将击中的敌人浸泡在黑淤泥中

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a ghoulish scythe that ignores immunity frames
Stealth strikes spawn souls on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出无视无敌帧的高速残影镰刀
潜伏攻击命中会召唤鬼魂

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a shiny blade that ricochets towards another enemy on hit
Stealth strikes cause the blade to home in after ricocheting, with each ricochet dealing 20% more damage
Stealth strikes also have increased piercing
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一把会在敌人间反弹的闪亮匕首
潜伏攻击使匕首反弹后获得持续追踪能力，每次反弹后造成20%额外伤害
潜伏攻击还会增加穿透力

Tooltip.Origin:
Stacks up to 3
Stealth strikes are super fast and pierce infinitely
Tooltip.Translation:
可以堆叠3个
潜伏攻击会使回旋镖飞得很快且能够无限穿透

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a shiny blade that ricochets towards another enemy on hit
Stealth strikes cause the blade to home in after ricocheting, with each ricochet dealing 20% more damage
Stealth strikes also have increased piercing
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一把会在敌人间反弹的闪亮匕首
潜伏攻击使匕首反弹后获得持续追踪能力，每次反弹后造成20%额外伤害
潜伏攻击还会增加穿透力

Tooltip.Origin:
Shoots a speedy homing spiky ball. Stacks up to 10.
Attaches to enemies and summons localized storm of god slayer kunai
Stealth strikes home in faster and summon kunai at a faster rate
Right click to delete all existing spiky balls
Tooltip.Translation:
发射追踪尖钉球。可以堆叠10个
可以黏在敌人身上召唤弑神苦无
潜伏攻击可以追踪地更快并更快地召唤弑神苦无
右键收回所有尖钉球

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a honeycomb that shatters into fragments
Grants the honey buff to players it touches
Stealth strikes can bounce off walls and enemies
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出会碎裂的蜂巢
会提供给接触的玩家蜂蜜增益
潜伏攻击扔出会弹跳的蜂巢

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a stardisk upwards which then launches itself towards your mouse cursor,
explodes into several astral energy bolts if the thrower is moving vertically when throwing it and during its impact
Stealth strikes spawn astral energy bolts from the sky as it flies
Tooltip.Translation:
发射一个星盘，先向上飞行一小段距离后飞向光标位置
当玩家有垂直速度时，星盘击中敌人会向四周发射星辉法球
潜伏攻击会天降星辉能量束

Tooltip.Origin:
The Subterranean Sun in the palm of your hand.
Shoots a gravity-defying spiky ball. Stacks up to 10.
Once stationary, periodically emits small suns that explode on hit
Stealth strikes emit suns at a faster rate and last for a longer amount of time
Right click to delete all existing spiky balls
Tooltip.Translation:
地底太阳的力量正被你握在掌心
发射不受重力影响停在空中的尖钉球，可以堆叠10个
一旦静止，尖钉球就会向四周发射小太阳，接触敌人后爆炸
潜伏攻击使尖钉球发射太阳的速度变快，持续时间更长
右键收回所有的尖钉球

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a constant barrage of black ice shards
Stealth strikes launch a chain short ranged ice chunks that shatter into ice shards
Tooltip.Translation:
快速发射黑色冰晶
潜伏攻击发射一串短距离黑色冰块

Tooltip.Origin: Stealth strikes spawn a cosmic explosion and freeze nearby enemies on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation: 潜伏攻击产生冰霜爆炸并冻结周围的敌人

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws homing ice stars
Stealth strikes pierce infinitely and spawn ice shards on hit
Ice Stars are too brittle to be recovered after being thrown
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出追踪的冰花
潜伏攻击会无限穿透并在命中时产生碎冰晶
用冰做的雪花太脆了，丢出去就会成为碎片

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws an ichor tipped trident
Stealth strikes are showered in splashes of ichor
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一个灵液三叉戟
潜伏攻击将释放灵液

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a burning dagger that starts spinning after travelling a short distance, inflicting additional damage while spinning
Stealth strikes cause the dagger to be engulfed in flames, exploding on contact with walls and enemies
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一个燃烧着的飞刀
潜伏攻击命中敌人会爆发出几个地狱火球

Tooltip.Origin:
The franciscas do more damage for a short time when initially thrown
Stealth strikes makes the franciscas have infinite piercing
Tooltip.Translation:
近距离会造成更多伤害
潜伏攻击能无限穿透

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a tight spread of six venomous reaper fangs that stick in enemies
Stealth strikes cause the teeth to emit a crushing shockwave on impact
You're gonna need a bigger boat
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出六颗毒牙，有的会黏在敌人身上
潜伏攻击命中会产生冲击波
'你将需要一艘更大的船'
汉化组科普：该武器描述引用自电影《大白鲨》

Tooltip.Origin: Throws an icy blade that splits into multiple ice stars on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation: 投出一把冰刃，击中敌人时碎成若干个冰星

Tooltip.Origin:
Stealth strikes throws three short ranged kylies instead of a single long range one
'Also known as Dowak'
Tooltip.Translation:
潜伏攻击发射三把短距离回飞棒
'也叫作Dowak'

Tooltip.Origin:
Sticks to enemies on hit and detonates after 3 seconds.
Breaks upon hitting blocks
Stealth Strike Effect: On explosion, fire and shrapnel are released
Stealth strike mines can stick to the ground and last much longer when doing so
Tooltip.Translation:
黏住敌人并在3秒后爆炸
碰到物块会落下
潜伏攻击会在爆炸时产生火焰和弹片
潜伏攻击地雷在地面停留时间更长

Tooltip.Origin:
The tomahawks have more damage for a short time when initially thrown
Stealth strikes makes the tomahawks pierce infinitely
Tooltip.Translation:
近距离会造成更多伤害
潜伏攻击能无限穿透

Tooltip.Origin:
Rapidly throws a variety of poisonous fangs that stick to enemies
Stealth strikes cause 3 very fast teeth to be thrown, ignoring gravity and inflicting extreme knockback
Tooltip.Translation:
迅速投掷大量毒牙
潜伏攻击发射不受重力影响的高速毒牙并造成强力击退

Tooltip.Origin:
Sticks to enemies and injects a potent toxin
Stealth strikes are trailed by homing urchin spikes
Tooltip.Translation:
粘住敌人并注射一种强大的毒素
潜伏攻击会使狮子鱼释放追踪海胆蛰

Tooltip.Origin:
Send the stars back to where they belong
Throws a stardust javelin trailed by rising stardust shards
Explodes into additional stardust shards upon hitting enemies
Stealth Strikes cause the stardust shards to fly alongside the javelin instead of rising
Tooltip.Translation:
'将星辰送回属于它们的地方'
投掷星尘标枪，飞行轨迹上生成上升的星尘碎片
命中爆炸后产生额外的星尘碎片
潜伏攻击生成的星尘碎片会跟着标枪而不是上升

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws out a set of three kunai that ignore gravity and slightly home in on enemies
After traveling enough distance, the kunai supercharge with lunar energy, homing in far more aggressively and exploding on impact
Stealth strikes instantly throw five supercharged Kunai
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出三把无视重力的追踪苦无
飞行足够的距离之后，苦无会获得月之能量，追踪至附近敌人并在命中时产生爆炸
潜伏攻击会立刻扔出加强的苦无

Tooltip.Origin:
Legendary Drop
Throws a stream of kunai that stick to enemies and explode
Right click to throw a single kunai that pierces, after piercing an enemy it emits a massive explosion on the next enemy hit
Revengeance drop
Tooltip.Translation:
曾经的传奇
发射一连串会嵌在敌人身上并爆炸的苦无
右键发射穿透之刃，穿透一个敌人后会对下一个敌人引发爆炸
复仇模式专属

Tooltip.Origin:
Hurls a heavy metal ball that shatters on impact 
Stealth Strikes makes the ball release spikes as it travels 
'This has to hurt'
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷一个会破裂的金属尖钉球
潜伏攻击会使金属尖刺生成在飞行路径上
'哦，那一定很疼'

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a fist that explodes 
Stealth Strikes makes the fist ricochet between enemies up to 4 times
Tooltip.Translation:
发射爆炸火拳
潜伏攻击会使火拳在敌人间来回反弹四次

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a scythe that emits molten globs on enemy hits
Stealth strikes spawn molten globs periodically in flight and more on-hit
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一把飞镰，命中敌人会产生神圣火球
潜伏攻击会使镰刀在飞行中不断释放神圣火球，并在命中时产生更多的火球

Tooltip.Origin:
Stealth strikes throw 3 bouncing dart at high speed
'Perfect for popping'
Tooltip.Translation:
潜伏攻击扔出三把高速弹跳飞刀
'非常适合用来扎破气球'

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a stream of short-range fungal roots
Stealth strikes spawn an explosion of fungi spores
Tooltip.Translation:
疯狂发射短距离根系
潜伏打击会引发真菌爆炸

Tooltip.Origin:
Unleashes a storm of nanoblack energy blades
Blades target bosses whenever possible
'She smothered them in Her hatred'
Tooltip.Translation:
释放纳米黑能量刀刃风暴
刀刃永远优先以Boss为目标
'生灵在她的无尽仇恨中溺亡'

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a spiky ball that sticks to everything
Explodes into cactus spikes after roughly 3 seconds
Can hurt town NPCs
Stealth strikes throw five at once
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出可以粘住一切的尖钉球
扔出三秒后爆炸
可以用来迫害城镇NPC
潜伏攻击一次扔出五个

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a spear that shatters when it hits an enemy
Stealth strikes cause the spear to summon homing stars as it flies
Strike your foes with this spear of the night
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一支击中敌人会粉碎的长矛
潜伏攻击命中敌人会释放追踪的星辰
用这支夜之长矛撕碎你的敌人

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a spiky ball that ignores gravity and summons a pair of dark and light orbs that orbit the player
Once the spiky ball disappears the orbs will home in on the nearest target
Stacks up to 10
Stealth strikes cause all spiky balls and orbs to be thrown at once
Right click to recall all existing spiky balls
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出不受重力影响的尖钉球并在周围召唤光暗球
尖钉球一旦消失，光暗球就会立刻追踪附近的敌人
可以堆叠10个
潜伏攻击可以一次释放所有尖钉球和光暗球
右键收回所有尖钉球

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a shadow bomb that explodes into homing souls 
Stealth Strikes makes the bomb manifest on the cursor and explode into more souls
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出暗影，命中后爆炸形成追踪幽魂
潜伏攻击在光标处召唤暗影并立刻爆炸成为幽魂

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires an enormous ghost lance that leaves lost souls in its wake
Explodes into phantom spirits on enemy hits
Stealth strikes summon ghost clones instead of lost souls
Tooltip.Translation:
发射巨大的幽灵长矛，在飞行轨迹召唤大量迷失幽灵
命中后爆出大量幻魂
潜伏攻击会将迷失幽灵替换成长矛的克隆幽灵

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a spectral javelin that rapidly releases lost souls
Fades away and slows down over time
Lost souls released later deal less damage
Stealth strikes don't slow down and souls always deal full damage
Tooltip.Translation:
发射一把分裂出迷失幽灵的长矛
随着时间缓慢减速后消失
迷失幽灵造成的伤害较小
潜伏攻击下长矛不会减速并且迷失幽灵具有全额伤害

Tooltip.Origin:
Releases a swarm of angry plague bees
Stealth strikes spawn more bees and generate a larger explosion
Tooltip.Translation:
释放大量瘟疫蜜蜂
潜伏攻击会产生一次大爆炸并生成更多的蜜蜂

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a poisonous spiky ball. Stacks up to 3.
Stealth strikes cause the balls to release spore clouds
Right click to delete all existing spiky balls
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一个剧毒尖钉球，可以堆叠3个
潜伏攻击会使尖钉球释放毒云
右键收回所有尖钉球

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws daggers that split after a while
Stealth strikes additionally explode into prism shards and briefly stun enemies
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷飞刀，短暂时间后分裂
潜伏攻击使飞刀额外爆裂出棱晶碎片并击晕敌怪

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires an unholy spear that explodes on death
Stealth strikes spawn smaller spears to fly along side it
Tooltip.Translation:
发射会爆炸的不洁之矛
潜伏攻击会在飞行轨迹上生成小的长矛克隆体

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a homing spear that explodes on enemy hits
Stealth strikes summon fireballs as they fly before exploding into a fiery fountain
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷追踪并在命中时爆炸的长矛
潜伏攻击召唤三个向上飞行然后坠落的爆炸火球

Tooltip.Origin: Throws an extremely fast hammer
Tooltip.Translation: 投出一把极快的圣锤

Tooltip.Origin: Succ
Tooltip.Translation: 万象天引！

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws daggers that explode and split after a while
Stealth strike splits more with a devastating explosion
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷会爆炸并分裂的匕首
潜伏攻击分裂的匕首会锁定更远的目标

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a swift homing disk
Stealth strikes explode into energy stars
Tooltip.Translation:
发射一个快速追踪的飞盘
潜伏攻击会爆炸形成星辉法球

Tooltip.Origin: Stealth strikes spawn rain clouds on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation: 潜伏攻击在击中敌人后产生雨云

Tooltip.Origin: Throws a flurry of homing knives that can heal the user
Tooltip.Translation: 投出数扇圣光飞刀，追踪敌人，治疗玩家

Tooltip.Origin:
Stacks up to 2
Stealth strikes throw 2 long ranged sand dollars that explode into coral shards on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation:
可以堆叠2个
潜伏攻击将同时扔出两个沙币，击中敌人后炸成珊瑚碎片

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a huge shuriken made out of fused sand unaffected by gravity which slowly accelerates horizontally
It does more damage depending on how fast it goes horizontally and how long it has been flying for
Stealth strikes makes the shuriken release sand clouds as it travels
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷一个沙漠手里剑，不受重力影响缓慢移动
造成的伤害取决于它的水平飞行速度和飞行时间
潜伏攻击会在飞行路径上生成大量沙尘

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws an ultra high velocity spear, which creates more projectiles that home in
The spear creates a Scarlet Blast upon hitting an enemy
Stealth strikes grant you lifesteal
'Divine Spear "Spear the Gungnir"'
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一把必中的神枪，在飞行路径上生成追踪的弹幕
长矛碰到敌人后会产生斯卡雷特爆炸
潜伏攻击会恢复生命
'神枪「冈格尼尔」'

Tooltip.Origin: Throws a bouncing cosmic scourge that emits tiny homing cosmic scourges on death and tile hits
Tooltip.Translation: 掷出一个宇宙灾虫，击中方块时反弹并释放出追踪的小宇宙灾虫

Tooltip.Origin:
Gains velocity over time
Stealth strikes gain damage as they damage enemies
Tooltip.Translation:
随时间加速
潜伏攻击造成更多伤害

Tooltip.Origin:
Snaps apart into a venomous cloud upon striking an enemy
Stealth strikes are coated with vile toxins, afflicting enemies with a powerful debuff
Tooltip.Translation:
命中时炸开形成毒云持续伤害敌人
潜伏攻击标枪会被致命的毒素环绕，对敌人造成强力的减益

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a bomb that explodes into a bubble which deals extra damage to enemies
Stealth strikes are faster and explode into 5 bubbles
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷炸弹，爆炸时生成泡泡，对敌人造成持续伤害
潜伏攻击会飞的更快并在爆炸时生成五个泡泡

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws daggers that split into scorching homing daggers
Stealth strikes fire volleys of homing daggers from the player on dagger hits
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷会分裂两次的追踪匕首，击中敌人时爆炸
潜伏攻击命中时从玩家身上发射追踪匕首

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a fast blade that spawns healing orbs when it kills an enemy
Stealth strikes cause 3 blades to be thrown at once
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷一个快速的飞刀，击杀敌人会生成愈合金珠
潜伏攻击一次扔出三把飞刀

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a grenade that explodes into a burst of lightning
Stealth strikes cause the grenade to leave an electrifying aura when it explodes
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一个爆炸后产生闪电的手雷
潜伏攻击命中后产生持续伤害闪电光环

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a slow, long-ranged boomerang
Stealth strikes grant the Mushy buff to the user on enemy hits and summon homing spores
Tooltip.Translation:
发射慢速，远距离的回旋镖
潜伏攻击给予使用者与菇共生增益并召唤爆炸孢子

Tooltip.Origin:
Shoots a gravity-defying spiky ball. Stacks up to 4.
Stealth strikes makes the balls rain feathers onto enemies when they hit
Right click to delete all existing spiky balls
Tooltip.Translation:
发射不受重力影响的尖钉球，可以堆叠4个
潜伏攻击会在命中敌人时召唤羽毛从天而降
右键收回所有尖钉球

Tooltip.Origin:
Swipes a cane that steals money from enemies.
Stealth strikes gives a 1 in 15 chance for enemies to drop 1-3 gold coins when hit
'Economy at its finest'
Tooltip.Translation:
挥动可以偷取敌人钱币的手杖
潜伏攻击有低概率偷取1-3金币
'最佳经济来源'

Tooltip.Origin:
Slows non-boss enemies slightly
Stealth strikes cause the main ball of sludge to split on hit, inflicting more damage
Tooltip.Translation:
稍微减慢非Boss敌人的速度
潜伏攻击命中会分裂，造成更多伤害

Tooltip.Origin:
Can latch on enemies and deal damage over time
Stealth strikes throw five clams at once that cause increased damage over time
Tooltip.Translation:
可以黏附于敌人，造成持续伤害
潜伏攻击一次性丢出5个夹贝，造成更高的持续伤害

Tooltip.Origin: Throws three spears with the outer two having homing capabilities
Tooltip.Translation: 投掷三把投矛，其中两支拥有追踪能力

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws an ancient spear that shatters enemy armor
Spears rain fossil shards as they travel
Stealth Strikes travel slower but further, raining more fossil shards
Tooltip.Translation:
投出一把高速飞行的远古长矛
长矛在飞行过程中会残留化石碎片对敌人造成伤害
潜伏攻击导致长矛飞行变慢但飞的更远，并产生更多的化石碎片

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a huge destructive mine that explodes into destruction bolts
Amount of bolts scales with enemies hit, up to 16
Stealth strikes always explode into the max amount of bolts
Tooltip.Translation:
发射巨大的毁灭地雷，爆炸形成追踪子母炸弹
最多生成16个子母炸弹
潜伏攻击总是会生成最大数量的子母炸弹

Tooltip.Origin: Lunar flares rain down on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation: 击中敌怪时天降月炎射线

Tooltip.Origin:
投掷飞行一段距离，停止后追踪附近敌人的飞刀
潜伏攻击一次投掷15把飞刀
砸！瓦鲁多！
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷飞行一段距离，停止后追踪附近敌人的飞刀
潜伏攻击一次投掷15把飞刀
砸！瓦鲁多！

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a spiky ball that sticks to everything
Stealth strikes throw seven at once and last a lot longer
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷可以黏住一切的尖钉球
潜伏攻击会一次扔出7个并持续更长的时间

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a throwing knife that leaves sparks as it travels.
Stealth strike causes the knife to be faster and leave a huge shower of sparks as it travels
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷一把在飞行路径上释放电火花的飞刀
潜伏攻击会使刀飞行地更快，并生成更多的电火花

Tooltip.Origin:
Creates a massive explosion on impact
Explodes into spikes and homing energy
Stealth strikes release energy as they fly
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷炸弹，命中时造成巨大爆炸
爆炸形成尖刺和追踪的能量攻击
潜伏攻击会在飞行轨迹上生成追踪能量

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons a slash attack at the cursor's position
Enemy hits build stealth and cause sword waves to fire from the player in the opposite direction
Does not consume stealth and cannot stealth strike
Tooltip.Translation:
在光标处召唤一把高速攻击的短剑
命中后回复潜行值并向反方向发射剑气
不消耗潜行值并且无法产生潜伏攻击

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a piercing dart with reduced immunity frames
Stealth strikes erupt into thorns on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷一支锐利的可以减少无敌帧的投镖
潜伏攻击在击中敌人后产生荆棘

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a disk that has a chance to generate several disks if enemies are near it
A max of three disks can be active at a time
Tooltip.Translation:
掷出泰拉飞盘，敌怪在附近时有几率分裂出几个新的飞盘
最多能掷出三个飞盘

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires small wavering claws
Stealth strikes launch a large, high speed claw which pierces
Tooltip.Translation:
发射小飞爪
潜伏攻击会发射一个巨大，高速的飞爪

Tooltip.Origin:
Slice 'n dice
Stealth strikes throw four at once
Tooltip.Translation:
切成碎片
潜伏攻击一次扔出4把飞镰

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a high velocity syringe that increases damage as it travels
Shatters into glass and plague cinders on impact
Stealth strikes also shatter into plague bees
'I'm pretty sure this isn't healthy'
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一个注射器，飞行距离越远伤害越高
命中后产生玻璃碎片和瘟疫喷溅
潜伏攻击命中会产生瘟疫蜜蜂
'我保证这对你的健康有百害而无一利'

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a brick that shatters if stealth is full.
'Prove its resistance by throwing it upwards and catching it with your face'
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷板砖，潜行值满会碎裂成碎砖
'把它往天上扔，然后用你的脸去接，以证明它的硬度'

Tooltip.Origin:
There should be no boundary to human endeavor.
Stealth strikes can hit more enemies and create a larger time field
Tooltip.Translation:
人类的努力永无止境.
潜伏攻击可以打击更多的敌人并产生更大的时之域

Tooltip.Origin: Stealth strikes act like a boomerang that spawns clones on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation: 潜伏攻击会在击中敌人时产生复制并使本体飞回你的手中

Tooltip.Origin: Stealth strikes spawn rain clouds on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation: 潜伏攻击在击中敌人后产生雨云

Tooltip.Origin:
Explodes into highly flammable black tar
Tar oils enemies and sets them alight
Stealth strikes leak tar as they fly
Tooltip.Translation:
爆炸形成高度易燃的黑焦油
敌人会被点燃
潜伏攻击会在飞行中释放黑焦油

Name.Origin: Triactis' True Paladinian Mage-Hammer of Might
Name.Translation: 真·泰阿克提斯之圣骑士魔锤

Tooltip.Origin: Explodes on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation: 击中敌人时发生爆炸

Tooltip.Origin: Explodes on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation: 击中敌人时发生爆炸

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires a cloudy javelin that bursts into wind slashes on hit
Wind slashes home if the javelin crits
Stealth strikes are trailed by homing wind slashes
Tooltip.Translation:
发射一只穿云之矛，命中时产生旋风
标枪暴击时旋风会追踪
潜伏攻击会在飞行轨迹上生成追踪的旋风

Tooltip.Origin: Stealth strikes stick to enemies while releasing sulfuric bubbles
Tooltip.Translation: 潜伏攻击会黏住敌人并释放毒气泡

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires random utensils in bursts of three
Grants Well Fed on enemy hits
Stealth strikes launch an additional butcher knife
'Space chickens, that is all.'
Tooltip.Translation:
一次发射三把随机的餐具
击中敌人获得饱腹增益
潜伏攻击发射一把额外的屠刀
'太空鸡，就是它了'

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a homing reaper scythe
Stealth strikes spawn razorblade typhoons on enemy hits
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出追踪的死神之镰
潜伏攻击在击中敌人时释放狂暴龙卷

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a web-covered ball that covers enemies in cobwebs to slow them down
Stealth strikes slow enemies down longer
Tooltip.Translation:
扔出一个布满蛛网的球，减慢敌人的速度
潜伏攻击会更大程度减速敌人

Tooltip.Origin: Stealth Strikes makes the knife fly further and hit several times at once

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons an ascended ice construct to protect you 
Changes attack modes by resummoning or reusing the staff 
The first mode makes it shoot sweeping lasers aimed at the enemy 
The second mode sacrifices its limbs to shoot out homing projectiles 
The third mode allows it to agressively tackle its enemies 
The fourth mode makes the limbs function as endothermic flamethrowers 
Requires 10 minion slots to be summoned 
There can only be one

Tooltip.Translation:
召唤一个强大的冰晶结构来保护你

第二形态：发射大量追踪冰晶
第三形态：连续冲撞敌人 
第四形态：旋转并向四周喷射极寒之火
需要10召唤栏
只能召唤一个 
[c/B0FBFF:不包含冰的双关语]

10% increased movement speed
