Tooltip.Origin:
While under the effects of a damaging debuff, you gain 10% increased damage and 5% crit
For every 25% of lost life, you gain 6% increased damage and 3% crit
This will max out at 18% increased damage and 9% crit when under 25% life
Provides immunity to poisoned, venom, and sulphuric poisoning
Tooltip.Translation:
受到伤害性减益影响时, 提高10%伤害和5%暴击率
你每失去25%生命值就会提高6%伤害和3%暴击率
最多在25%生命值以下时增加18%伤害和9%暴击率
对中毒、毒液和硫磺海中毒免疫

Tooltip.Origin:
Whenever your minions hit an enemy you will gain a random buff
These buffs will either boost your defense, summon damage, or life regen for a while
If you have the offensive boost, enemies hit by minions will sometimes be hit by stars
Tooltip.Translation:
你的召唤物击中敌人时会给你一个随机灵魂增幅
这些增幅包括短时增幅防御、召唤伤害和生命恢复速度
如果你处在此饰品的召唤伤害增幅下，被召唤物击中的敌人有时会被落星击中

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons a small Old Duke to fight for you

Tooltip.Translation:
召唤一个年轻的硫海公爵为你而战

Tooltip.Origin:
Minions release an irradiated aura on enemy hits
+1 max minion

召唤物在攻击敌人时释放辐射光环
+1召唤栏

Tooltip.Origin:
Increased max minions by 4 and 15% increased minion damage
Increased minion knockback
Minions inflict a variety of debuffs
Minions spawn damaging sparks on enemy hits
Minion attacks have a chance to instantly kill normal enemies
Tooltip.Translation:
+4召唤栏,增加15%召唤伤害
增加召唤物击退
召唤物会附加各种减益
召唤物在攻击敌人时生成伤害火花
召唤物有几率直接致死普通敌人

Tooltip.Origin:
Transforms you into an emissary of the profaned goddess
Requires 10 minion slots to use in order to grant the following effects
All non-summon weapons are converted into powerful summon variations
Falling below 50% life will empower these attacks
[c/f05a5a:Transforms Melee attacks into a barrage of spears]
[c/3a83e4:Transforms Magic attacks into a powerful splitting fireball]
[c/85e092:Transforms Ranged attacks into a flurry of fireballs and meteors]
[c/e97451:Transforms Rogue attacks into a deadly crystalline spiral]
Summons and empowers the profaned babs to fight alongside you
You are no longer affected by burn out when hit
Provides buffs depending on the time of day
Provides heat and cold protection in Death Mode
Thinking back, it was a boring life
[c/FFBF49:And so we burn it all in the name of purity]
Tooltip.Translation:
将你变身为亵渎之神的神使
需要10个召唤栏以启用以下所有效果
所有非召唤攻击都被转换为强力的召唤变种
掉到50%血量以下会强化这些攻击
[c/f05a5a:将近战攻击转换为一波投矛]
[c/3a83e4:将魔法攻击转换为强力分裂火球]
[c/85e092:将远程攻击转换为一阵火球与陨石]
[c/e97451:将盗贼攻击转换为死亡水晶螺旋]
召唤并强化三个亵渎守卫为你而战
受伤时不再受到灼伤减益
基于所处的时间给予增益
在死亡模式下提供寒冷和高温防护
我的人生平淡无奇，索然无味
[c/FFBF49:现在我们以纯化之名将其燃烧殆尽]

Tooltip.Origin: Rogue javelin projectiles have a chance to spawn a jewel spike when destroyed

Tooltip.Origin:
Strange, to find out that the mutant terror of the seas was not alone in its unique biology.

Uses your life as ammo
Tooltip.Translation:
射出一股生命血火
按下鼠标后连续发射10秒
消耗你的生命作为弹药

Tooltip.Origin: Has a chance to release rotten chunks instead of bullets.
Tooltip.Translation: 有几率射出腐烂肉块而不是子弹.

Tooltip.Origin:
Fires angled shots in the direction of the cursor
Can only be shot in a cone direction above the player
High IQ required
Tooltip.Translation:
向光标处发射有角度的射击
仅能朝着玩家头顶的一定仰角范围内开火
要求:智商高

Tooltip.Origin:
Legendary Drop
Fires an intense helix of flames that explode into a column of fire
Right click to fire a short ranged cloud of lingering flames
Revengeance drop
Tooltip.Translation:
曾经的传奇，如果它在过去存在
射出一束猛烈的烈焰螺旋，爆炸成一列火柱
右击发射一团短程余晖烈焰
复仇模式专属

Tooltip.Origin: Fires slow arrows that occasionally inflict sulfuric poisoning
Tooltip.Translation: 发射有一定几率造成硫磺海剧毒减益的剧毒之箭

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a rolling barrel that explodes on wall collision
Stealth strikes make it rain on collision
Tooltip.Translation:
丢出一个滚动酸雨桶，路径上碰到阻挡方块时爆炸
潜伏攻击会使桶在飞行过程中降下酸雨

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a flask of sickly green, irradiated bile which explodes on collision
Stealth strikes make the explosion much more violent and powerful
Tooltip.Translation:
丢出一瓶恶心的、充满辐射的绿色胆汁，碰撞后爆炸
潜伏攻击会使爆炸更加强烈

Tooltip.Origin:
Fishy bombers inbound!
Launches a skyfin nuke that homes in on enemies below it
Stealth strikes throw three skyfin nukes that home in regardless of enemy position
Tooltip.Translation:
鱼雷母舰入境!
发射一枚天鳍核武并追踪敌人
潜伏攻击将同时丢出三个无视敌人位置且会追踪的天鳍核武

Tooltip.Origin:
War Never Changes
Throws a fuel container with trace amounts of plutonium that explodes into a nuclear explosion
The explosion does not occur if there are no tiles below it
Stealth strikes leave a lingering irradiated zone after the explosion dissipates
Tooltip.Translation:
战争永远不变
投掷一个装有微量钚的燃料容器并且造成核爆炸
如果下面没有物块，则爆炸不会发生
潜伏攻击会使爆炸后的区域留下辐射

Tooltip.Origin:
Throws a speedy boomerang
Stealth strikes fire two boomerangs that go much faster and release sand rapidly
Tooltip.Translation:
投掷一个飞快的环刃
潜伏攻击将同时投掷两个速度更快的环刃且释放沙子

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a cute forest spirit that scatters toxic petals
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤飘散着有毒花瓣但可爱的莨菪之灵

Tooltip.Origin:
Surprisingly sturdy, I reckon this could defeat the Mafia in a single blow
Summons a magic hat to hover above your head
The hat will release a variety of objects to assault your foes
Requires 5 minion slots to use
There can only be one
Tooltip.Translation:
交涉失败，准备动手!
召唤一顶魔法礼帽飘在你的头顶上
帽子会释放各种物体来攻击你的敌人
消耗5召唤栏位
只能存在一顶帽子
（出自游戏：时光之帽）

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a gross Old Duke head on the ground
Tooltip.Translation: 在地面上召唤一个硫海遗爵的头

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a toad that explodes if enemies are nearby
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤一个在敌人接近时爆炸的蟾蜍

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a really hot flower over your head
Tooltip.Translation: 在你的头顶召唤一朵火焰之花

Tooltip.Origin:
Legendary Drop
Summons the power of the ancient ice castle
For each minion slot used, you will gain an additional orbiting shield spike
These spikes accelerate rapidly towards a nearby enemy to inflict heavy damage
They take some time to regenerate after launching themselves at the target, however
On right click, summons a duplicate ring around the targeted enemy, which slowly converges before exploding
Revengeance Drop
Tooltip.Translation:
曾经的传奇，如果它在过去存在
召唤古老冰霜城堡的力量
你可以消耗一个召唤槽以召唤一个额外的环轨冰钉
这些冰钉会极快加速冲向附近的敌人,对他们造成大量伤害
但在击中目标后它们需要一些时间恢复
右键使用时在目标周围生成冰钉的复制缓慢会聚并爆炸
复仇模式掉落

Tooltip.Origin:
Nevermore.
Summons a powerful raven which teleports and dashes
Tooltip.Translation:
永不复返。
召唤一个强大的渡鸦,可以传送和猛冲

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a cosmic gunship to shoot down your foes
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤一艘宇宙炮艇击败你的敌人

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a holy blade to fight for you
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤圣刃为你而战

Tooltip.Origin:
You could've sworn that they turned even scarier when you looked at their reflections in a mirror
Summons a brimseeker to keep you company
Firing another brimseeker when all minion slots are filled summons a brimstone aura
The aura empowers your brimseeker summons and produces damaging fireballs
Only one aura can persist at a time
Tooltip.Translation:
当你在镜子里看到他们的倒影时,他们绝对看起来更加可怕
召唤一个硫火搜寻者
当召唤栏耗尽时,再次使用召唤一个硫火光环
这个光环会加强你的硫火搜寻者并产生伤害性的火球
只能有一个光环同时存在

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons a skeletal dragon and her two children
Requires 6 minion slots to be summoned
There can only be one family
Tooltip.Translation:
召唤一只骨龙和她的两个孩子
需要六个召唤栏
骨龙一家只能有一个

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons a frigid entity with a head
If the entity already exists, using this item again will cause it to gain more heads
Tooltip.Translation:
召唤具有一个头的寒冰实体
如果寒冰实体已经存在,再次使用会召唤更多的头

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a frozen flower over your head
Tooltip.Translation: 在你的头顶召唤一朵冰花

Tooltip.Origin: Releases a small, special variant of the plaguebringers
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤一个小而特别的瘟疫携带者变种

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a stack of haunted dishes to fight for you
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤一个缠怨鬼碟为你而战

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons an orbiting blade
Right click to launch all blades towards the cursor
Tooltip.Translation:
召唤一把刀锋
右键使刀锋冲向鼠标所在位置

Tooltip.Origin:
There’s a faded note written on it in green
Only the first line is readable: 'She won’t afflict you, I promise!'
Summons the harbinger of the plague...?
Consumes all of the remaining minion slots on use
Must be used from the hotbar
Increased power based on the number of minion slots used
Tooltip.Translation:
其上有暗淡的绿色字条
只有第一排的文字依稀可见: '我保证她不会传染给你!'
召唤瘟疫的先兆...?
使用时消耗所有召唤栏
必须在快捷栏使用
随消耗召唤栏增加而增强

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a UFO to vaporize enemies
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤一个UFO,让你的敌人人间蒸发

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a flying orthocera sentry at the mouse position
Tooltip.Translation: 在鼠标位置召唤一个悬空的直角石哨卫

Tooltip.Origin:
Gain absolute control over light itself
Summons a radiant aura
Consumes all of the remaining minion slots on use
Must be used from the hotbar
Increased power based on the number of minion slots used
Tooltip.Translation:
取得对光芒本身的绝对控制
召唤一个璀璨光环
使用时消耗所有召唤栏
必须在快捷栏使用
随消耗召唤栏增加而增强

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a baby blood crawler to protect you
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤血腥爬行者宝宝保护你

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons small skeletons to fight for you
The skeletons leave behind bone cells as they move
Tooltip.Translation:
召唤小骷髅为你而战
小骷髅在移动时留下骨细胞

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a baby stormlion to fight for you
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤风暴蚁狮宝宝为你而战

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons a plague jet to pummel your enemies into submission
Consumes bullets
Sometimes shoots a missile instead of a bullet
Tooltip.Translation:
召唤一个瘟疫战机,打得敌人叫妈妈
战机消耗子弹
偶尔射出导弹而不是子弹

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a baby eater of souls to protect you
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤灵魂吞噬者宝宝保护你

Tooltip.Origin: Disables natural Acid Rain spawns
Tooltip.Translation: 关闭酸雨事件自然生成

Tooltip.Origin: Causes most ranged weapons to sometimes release acid droplets from the sky
Tooltip.Translation: 让大多数远程武器攻击时在空中释放酸性液滴

Tooltip.Origin: Summons a baby Plaguebringer pet
Tooltip.Translation: 召唤一个瘟疫使者宝宝宠物

Tooltip.Origin:
When placed down nearby players can breath underwater
This effect does not work in the abyss
Nearby players are also immune to the sulphuric poisoning
Tooltip.Translation:
放置后附近的玩家可以在水下呼吸
此效果在深渊中不起作用
附近的玩家免疫硫磺剧毒

Tooltip.Origin: Reduces the effects of the sulphuric waters
Tooltip.Translation: 减弱硫磺海水的影响

Tooltip.Origin: Opens locked rusty chests
Tooltip.Translation: 撬开锁住的锈蚀箱子

Tooltip.Origin: Shoots slow, powerful shells that trail an irradiated aura
Tooltip.Translation: 射出缓慢但强大的箭矢，路径上会留下辐射光环

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons radioactive heads that are bound by your body
If the entity already exists, using this item again will cause it to gain more heads
Tooltip.Translation:
召唤连在你身体上的辐射之头
如果已经存在，再次使用将获得更多的头

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons a long-abandoned drone to support you
Clicking on an enemy gives them a tiny prick, causing them to become aggravated
The drone hovers above nearby enemies and gives them various debuffs
Tooltip.Translation:
召唤一架被遗弃已久的锈蚀无人机来支援你
无人机在附近的敌人上空盘旋
瞄准敌人后炸裂成碎片并造成辐射减益

Tooltip.Origin: Spreads the astral infection to some blocks
Tooltip.Translation: 使多个物块蔓延星辉瘟疫

Tooltip.Origin:
Creates a profaned crystal that charges power
Holding out the crystal slows the player down
At the end of its life, the crystal heals the player
Tooltip.Translation:
创造一块充满能量的亵渎水晶
使用水晶蓄力时会减慢玩家的速度
当蓄力完成时，它将治愈玩家

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons a bulwark at the mouse position
The bulwark killed by enemies and all projectiles.
On death, the bulwark explodes into a rotating burst of shards
If an enemy is in the area of the shards, its next attack is much weaker. This effect has a cooldown
After a bit of time, the shards come together to reform the original bulwark.
这种聚合只能发生3次。
You gain a small cooldown when summoning a new bulwark.
If a bulwark already exists, using this item will relocate it
10% increased summon damage and 15% increased rogue velocity
Tooltip.Translation: 增加10%召唤伤害和15%盗贼弹幕速度

Tooltip.Origin: It's oddly warm. Attracts the forbidden one.
Tooltip.Translation: 奇怪的暖和.可吸引...大老爹！

Tooltip.Origin: Casts a devastating ray of holy power
Tooltip.Translation: 释放拥有神圣之力的毁灭射线

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons an energy explosion on enemy hits
Right click to summon an energy shell for a few seconds that halves all damage sources
This has a 45 second cooldown
Tooltip.Translation:
击中敌人时产生能量爆炸
右键召唤可以使伤害减半的能量庇护
此效果有45秒冷却时间

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons three unusual flowers over your head
Each flower consumes one minion slot
Tooltip.Translation:
在你的头顶召唤三朵不同寻常的花
每朵花各占一个召唤栏

Tooltip.Origin:
Summons a spear that causes you to lunge towards the mouse position
The spear requires a charge-up. The longer the charge, the more strong the lunge
The spear disappears immediately if you are not holding this item while charging
If enough time has passed or the spear collides into a wall, the spear dies and the lunge ends
Tooltip.Translation:
召唤一支圣矛，使你朝着鼠标位置冲锋
圣矛需要充能，充能时间越长，冲锋力度越猛
如果充能时未持有此物品，矛就会立即消失
如果充能时间过长或者矛撞到墙上,矛会消失且冲锋结束
（矛可以在空中转向）
'卡其脱离太，莫诺莫诺伊...'
